Title: Массаж
Review: Отличный foot massage, чисто, внимательный персонал, вкусный чай по окончании процедуры. Рекомендую к посещению
Hotel_Name: NaiMassagesหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: amazing
Review:
very good massage, nice place on the front beach.
great team, friendly , good price and nice place up for oil massages
Hotel_Name: NaiMassagesหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Unprofessional, Unethical and Fraud Business
Review:
Avoid Nam Taxi Services at all cost. They are highly Unprofessional and Unethical. Firstly, when you try to book, they will never respond through emails.
After several pokings, they will respond and force you take a higher category vehicle to make more money.
These are nothing but a bunch of fraudulent ladies engaged in the business of scamming tourists.
So don't risk your trip with these frauds.
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent taxi services
Review:
Used three times recently and many times over several,years. The first and only choice for taxi services.
Always on time (early) and always very efficient.
You will not be unhappy to use the business.
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Review: I have been using Nam's services for the last few years . More recently during early 2022, I used her frequently to a range of places and and at all times the drivers were punctual, courteous , accomodating to changes and most important of all safe drivers
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Title: Safe drivers, excellent service
Review: I used Nam's Taxi Service a few times during my last trip. Once from Bangkok to Pattaya, once from Pattaya back to Bangkok, and finally for Bangkok to BKK airport. Response was quick and prices were reasonable. The drivers arrived promptly or early every single time. Vehicles were clean and drivers were friendly and safe. Highly recommend.
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Title: Great taxi service in Bangkok!
Review: I used Nam’s Taxi Service a few times between Suvarnabhumi Airport and my hotel in the Bangkok city-center. The drivers were all women and they were always ready to pick me up on time. Their cars were very clean and they drove safely. I highly recommend Nam’s Taxi Service and would use them again in Bangkok.
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent service.
Review:
I booked Nams Taxi via email well in advance of my trip. A few days before my trip. Nam sent me a photograph of my driver Chanya and the place she will be waiting. As she did with Noina on my return journey.

Very smooth relaxing journey both ways.

Nam text me before both each pick up to make sure everything was okay.

High recommended.
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Title: A Joy
Review: My Fiance and myself booked Nam's Taxi company for transfers to and from Pattaya from the airport. I had good communication from the company as they give you contact numbers and you can add them on WhatsApp. When we arrived the lady was standing waiting at the exact point we had been told to meet at. The driver was talkative and got us to the hotel in prompt fashion. On the return leg back to the airport the driver was 20 mins early which we appreciated as this is better than being late. Another good drive back to the airport. I will be using this service again the next time we visit Thailand.
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent Safe drivers
Review: This was our second year using Nam’s taxis. Just as good as always, we used them from Bangkok airport to Pattaya and back again. Also used them for a return trip to Ko Samet and have to say what a lovely lady Milky our driver was. Always feel safe with Nam’s taxis and will definitely use them again
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Title: OK
Review: Arrived at pickup time together with destination. Turned up at hotel to transfer to hotel on time as agreed
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Title: Taxi.
Review: Billig bar taxi som kan hämta och lämna dig .. Vill du göra utflykter så går det också bra. Bara kom överens om priset.
Hotel_Name: NamsTaxiServiceพทยาไทย

Title: ウォーキングストリートの入口付近
Review:
ビーチロード沿い、ウォーキングストリート入口手前にある正常なマッサージ屋。
店内は綺麗で居心地良かったです。
60分フルボディで300バーツでした。
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Professional Massage
Review: Nantika Physical Thai Massage is located in Beach Road Pattaya. It's a very Professional , Luxury and Clean Massage Center. It's located in a very good place near the famous WALKING STREE. It's a family-friendly Massage center and you can go there with your wife or Kids without any worriment .It's a good idea to take a massage and relax before surfing the Walking Street. (Working time 10AM–3AM )
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Nantika 2 - another outlet a few doors down along same street
Review:
Market price for 1 hour feet or body massage at 200 baht.
Visited Nantika 2, and the lady serving was using such light pressure I thought the proper foot massage has not started, so not to be rude, i waited and until 30mins later, she is still using the same pressure. It was liken to no massage at all, I had to ask her to please press harder for the remaining 30mins. My husband tipped his masseuse who did a good job of providing strong massage, whereas we clearly were not happy with my masseuse and left without anything extra for her.
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: フットマッサージを受けました
Review: ビーチロードから店内を見て、きれいそうだったのでフットマッサージをしてもらいました。しっかりしたマッサージで良かったです。
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent experience with wonderfully skilled staff
Review: Brilliant little place to get all sorts of treatments, being with a lads group of 6 out there for a stag do, we ended up using this facility at least once a day for foot, head, neck and back massage. The service is impeccable with focus on pain points - staff are professional and knowledgeable while being up for a laugh. Wouldn't hesitate one bit to recommend using this place to anyone. To top it all off, the value for money aspect makes this a no brainer. Do note however there are two locations (couple of mintes apart) with the same name - i used the original Nantika rather than the Nantika 2 although no doubt the service will be similar.
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: 便利な場所。気持ちよかったです。
Review:
海沿いのメイン道路沿いで、ウォーキングストリート入口の手前150メートルほどの場所にあります。このあたりに多数あるホテルに滞在される方には便利な場所です。
外とはガラス張りで清潔感があり、1時間200-300パーツほどのフットマッサージも気持ちよかったです。お勧めです。
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: The best massage in an affordable price !!
Review:
Excellent foot and body massage. The place is very clean.The staff's are highly professional and super friendly.
You will have an excellent relaxing massage.The price is wonderfully matched to the service. Thank you.
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: For 200 baht an hour, it’s definitely worth it!
Review: We came to this massage joint the previous year when we were here. Not so great an experience then. But this time it was different. The masseur was fun and friendly. She knew what she was doing a well. After this experience, I guessed it all boils down to luck when it comes to having massages in Thailand. Sometimes you get those great ones and of course, sometimes you’ll get this mediocre ones.
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: ウォーキングストリート前
Review:
ビーチロード沿いにありウォーキングストリートの近くで立地抜群。
そのせいか、値段は強気の1時間300バーツ。

知り合いのマッサージ師が移籍したので行きましたが高い。
店内は綺麗で清潔。すぐ近くに2号店もあり高くても場所柄良く入る。
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Dh Great
Review:
Good experience one must try the feel output is satisfied
Close to walking street Pattaya beach road close
Hotel_Name: NantikaPhysicalThaiMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Outstanding value
Review: The rooms are very nice, clean, and comfortable. The owner's ( Allen and Na) are very friendly and accommodating. The restaurant/Pub is fantastic! The variety and quality of food and service is 5-star,
Hotel_Name: NasPlaceพทยาไทย

Title: Well worth visiting
Review: This has a reputation for providing 'The best fish n chips in town" and we can absolutely confirm this! Friendly, spotlessly clean, relaxing and affordable . Highly recommended. We will definitely be returning.
Hotel_Name: NasPlaceพทยาไทย

Title: Fab place!
Review:
Food is very reasonably priced and portions are massive especially the roast! It is super yummy too 😊

Alan, na and Sara are fantastic hosts and all needs are catered for.

Would really recommend
Hotel_Name: NasPlaceพทยาไทย

Title: The best fish & chips in Thailand
Review:
By far the best fish & chips in Thailand. Food is to die for. Na, Alan & Sara were fantastic hosts and nothing was too much trouble. All our tastes were catered for.
Also had the slow roasted pork dinner - yum ! Will definitely be visiting again
Hotel_Name: NasPlaceพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent food and fabulous staff
Review:
Alan, Na and Sar are some of the best hosts in Thailand. Alan is from Hull and Na makes the best fish and chips in Thailand, just like back home in England.
There is a very friendly atmosphere and is packed out most nights.
They also offer rooms for rent by the day, which are immaculately clean. There are plenty of others bars in the next street if you fancy a pub crawl and occasionally there is entertainment.
Hotel_Name: NasPlaceพทยาไทย

Title: 5* food
Review: Na's Place is a superb bar with food that is always first rate, the fish and chips are famous in the area, and after trying them I now know why, "fantastic" is the only word. We also stayed at Na's Place in one of their apartments, this was very spacious, clean and comfortable, Na and family are perfect hosts and are always happy to help with making your holiday one in a lifetime, we will certainly be returning in the future.
Hotel_Name: NasPlaceพทยาไทย

Title: Fish and Chips - in Pattaya, but just like home!
Review: A great little bar in Bang Saray run by a Thai/Brit Couple, great selection of FREEZING COLD bottles, But its the fish and chips that sell it to me (and my travelling buddies ) every time. Rooms for hire too (I understand it is currently closed until the hosts return in September i think)
Hotel_Name: NasPlaceพทยาไทย

Title: Outstanding value
Review: The rooms are very nice, clean, and comfortable. The owner's ( Allen and Na) are very friendly and accommodating. The restaurant/Pub is fantastic! The variety and quality of food and service is 5-star,
Hotel_Name: NasPlaceพทยาไทย

Review: This has a reputation for providing 'The best fish n chips in town" and we can absolutely confirm this! Friendly, spotlessly clean, relaxing and affordable . Highly recommended. We will definitely be returning.

Title: Relax assicurato
Review: Qualità prezzo imbattibile da anni lo frequentiamo, relax assicurato vi consiglio le combinazione dei trattamenti. Provate e vedrete
Hotel_Name: NemosMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Thai oil Massage
Review:
We purchased the Thai oil massage. It was a 2 hour massage. We had several massages before we decided to try this place after many research. I read the owner was an American so I thought well I might just have to try after looking at the reviews.

Oh my gosh it was amazing. Becky started with the Thai stretching & deep tissue massage for 1 hour than oil massage for another hour. She massages my soar calf muscles that I had for a week. It may hurt at first but it’s worth it. I literally was moaning and growling at first but this morning I feel like a new person. So worth it.

Please tip the girls if it’s worth it. My hubby said his massage girl should have worked on his back more. I think will let them know when we return.
Hotel_Name: NemosMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Great Normal Massage
Review:
My wife and I used this popular place several times during our stay.
Staff were excellent as were the massages.
Hotel_Name: NemosMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Great Deals
Review: Great deals! We did the 1 hour foot massage & 1 hour oil massage for 290 baht. The foot massage was a little lackluster. Oil massage was better and had better pressure but the flow of the massage was odd so it felt extremely timed out. My masseuse did crack my back and neck very well though. I'd suggest doing the 1 hour oil & 1 hour Thai massage for 350 baht.
Hotel_Name: NemosMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Great Legitimate Massages... and really good value
Review: I know the owner of this place since I have been going very often during my trips to Pattaya. They do a great job of training here so anyone you get is a good masseuse but of course we all have our favorites. Foot massage and ear spa is a great value and makes me feel rejuvenated. Definitely stop in if you get a chance. They also have a punch card for a free service every 10 or so.
Hotel_Name: NemosMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Great massage
Review:
This is an excellent massage parlour for a proper massage (no naughty stuff!!!). I have been coming here for years. Always lovely staff.

I recommend the ear candles...... you would be amazed at how much wax comes out!!!!!
Hotel_Name: NemosMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Un massaggio al giorno leva il medico di torno
Review:
Ottima struttura di massaggi con qualità prezzo eccellenti, già clienti di Nemo’s 1, Nemo’s 2 struttura nuova personale gentile, pulito, se desiderate un massaggio delicato ditelo prima e sarete accontentati, massaggio preferito ai piedi e corpo con olio se abbinati 1 ora + 1 prezzo strepitoso 290 BAHT, vi fanno la tessera fedeltà dopo 10 avrete un massaggio base gratis.
Отличное массажное оборудование с отличным качеством цены, уже клиенты Nemo's 1, Nemo's 2, новая структура дружелюбный персонал, чистый, если вы хотите нежный массаж, скажите это раньше, и вы будете удовлетворены, массаж ног и тело с маслом, если объединить 1 час + 1 цена Потрясающие 290 бат, они дадут вам карту лояльности, после 10 у вас будет бесплатный базовый массаж.
Hotel_Name: NemosMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Relax assicurato
Review: Qualità prezzo imbattibile da anni lo frequentiamo, relax assicurato vi consiglio le combinazione dei trattamenti. Provate e vedrete
Hotel_Name: NemosMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Un massaggio al giorno leva il medico di torno
Review:
Ottima struttura di massaggi con qualità prezzo eccellenti, già clienti di Nemo’s 1, Nemo’s 2 struttura nuova personale gentile, pulito, se desiderate un massaggio delicato ditelo prima e sarete accontentati, massaggio preferito ai piedi e corpo con olio se abbinati 1 ora + 1 prezzo strepitoso 290 BAHT, vi fanno la tessera fedeltà dopo 10 avrete un massaggio base gratis.
Отличное массажное оборудование с отличным качеством цены, уже клиенты Nemo's 1, Nemo's 2, новая структура дружелюбный персонал, чистый, если вы хотите нежный массаж, скажите это раньше, и вы будете удовлетворены, массаж ног и тело с маслом, если объединить 1 час + 1 цена Потрясающие 290 бат, они дадут вам карту лояльности, после 10 у вас будет бесплатный базовый массаж.
Hotel_Name: NemosMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Great place to have a drink and socialise
Review: I dont have that many go to bars this is the main one i guess. Situated off Soi Bukao its nicely situated to be the springboard for a night out. Having come by for a few drinks there is the option to see the night out here, head up soi bukao, Lk metro, Soi Diana Lengkee or over to walking st or up to soi 6 7 or 8. So its a very good location to start the evening. Its a bar so what do you want? Drinks socialising. The prices are very good indeed, the staff and management are friendly and its the sort of bar if youre a lone traveller you can make friends easily with the other customers who tend to be regulars here. The music laptop is easy to use so if you want to play a song thats not a problem. The sound system and big tv screens are tops. What can put you off a bar in Pattaya is either the lack of music or the playing the electro gangsta rap that either the younger brigade or the thai ladies like but i cant stand. You dont get that at Peacocks, you might have to listen to another customers choice for a song or two but the music is normally cool as. So all in all if you can find it down the top of soi Chaiyapoon have negotiated your way past the lady boy bars it is well worth the effort. Its not a busy street so dont expect the bar to be heaving, you can relax have a drink play some music buy a staff member a drink she will sit and chat with you but you wont get harassed for drinks like many other bars.
Hotel_Name: NewPeacocksพทยาไทย

Title: Top Bar in Pattaya
Review: I had an excellent time in this bar when visited in October 2015. Fantastic sound system, clean and modern bar and a really nice atmosphere with very friendly lovely staff.
Hotel_Name: NewPeacocksพทยาไทย

Title: Best Bar in Pattaya - New Peacocks Bar
Review: I have been to many bars in Pattaya, Thailand and this one really impressed me. The bar has everything you want, international sports on big screens and customers can request their own music on their excellent sound system. The bar has a great atmosphere with lovely staff from 23 years old. The beer prices are also reasonable starting at 65 Baht. I would go back there any time!!!
Hotel_Name: NewPeacocksพทยาไทย

Title: Yuth Bar
Review:
Gemütliche Musikbar mit Live-Bands von 20 bis 04 Uhr!
Guter und freundlicher Service mit moderaten Preisen.
Direkt neben dem Siam@Siam Hotel.
Immer wieder gerne...
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Horrible Staff.
Review:
I walked in here on the second night of my 3 week recent holiday to Pattaya, sat down and ordered a bottle of chang (100 baht) which arrived quickly.

Within 30 seconds of my drink arriving two lady staff were sat next to me and started talking to me.

After less than a minute one of them asked me if I'd buy them both a lady drink (that's approximately seven pounds fifty for both drinks)

I thought it a bit extreme expecting me to spend that much money on them that quickly so I politely said maybe later.

The girls response shocked me. She immediately told me I'm not a nice man. Then she followed that up by telling me I needed to take a shower.

WOW, ::::::::::::::::::, I mean,:::::::::::, just,:::::::::::::::,WOW.

I drank up, left and didn't trouble them again on my 3 week holiday.

So, in this bar if you don't buy two lady drinks within 3 minutes of sitting down you get subjected to unpleasantness and insults. I wonder how this bar stays in business.

I really enjoy live heavy rock music bars and was disappointed to rule this bar out for that holiday and for future holidays but I can't put up with being treated like that.
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Great music and a great vibe ...
Review:
This bar doesn’t look anything special from the outside, and it’s amongst a few similar looking bars, but it absolutely rocks! The music is what gets your attention and what drags you in off the street, but it’s the cool vibe and the friendly atmosphere that keeps your there, and makes you want to go back for more. If you like girls, but don’t like being attacked by girls, you’ll love this place ... it’s opposite some great food stalls outside Big C as well.

Love the people that work there, they make you feel that you belong!

My favourite bar in Pattaya by a long way ...
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Nette Bar mit guter Live - Musik
Review: Ist eine nette Bar mit sehr guter Live Musik, während des Abends wechseln die Bands sich ab. Zum Unterhalten schon fast etwas laut, aber "Sanuk mak mak" wie die Thais sagen würden! Preislich im normalen Durchschnitt, man kann da schon einige nette Stunden verbringen.
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Very Loud Live Music
Review: Each night the bar had two live bands playing rock music, the first set from 21.30 to 23.30 and the second from 11.30 until the last customer was left standing. The staff are very friendly and are there to ensure you drink plenty during your visit. A great place to go if you are into all types of rock music in a friendly atmosphere..
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Good Bar with good live rock music; do NOT use google maps to find it
Review:
Inspired by other reviews I visited this bar to see if the band was any good. It was and I can confirm what other reviews said: good band and friendly girls and staff. I had a really good time there.

It's neighbour Toy Bar has good live bands too, so you can choose!

A remark about google maps however. When I tried to locate this bar Google Maps tried to send me to a Soi near Central Festival. It is definitely not there! It's location is opposite Big C North Pattaya, on 2nd Road between Soi 2 and 3.
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Для вечернего времяпровождения
Review: Бар с живой музыкой по вечерам. Играют кавера в основном хард роковые. Как музыканты - вполне приличные, вокалисты - совсем никакие. В баре особо кухни нет, в основном напитки, есть бильярдный стол.
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Ничего особенного
Review: Обычный открытый бар. По вечерам бывает, играет живая музыка. Большой выбор напитков. Много европейцев.
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Обновленный
Review: Обновлённый бар, с теме же столами для бильярда. Улыбчивыми девочками, хорошими напитками. Ничего особенного.
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Good value
Review:
I go to this bar every trip.
Good bands, friendly girls and staff, and the place attracts fun customers.
Highly recommended.
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Yuth Bar
Review:
Gemütliche Musikbar mit Live-Bands von 20 bis 04 Uhr!
Guter und freundlicher Service mit moderaten Preisen.
Direkt neben dem Siam@Siam Hotel.
Immer wieder gerne...
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Good value
Review:
I go to this bar every trip.
Good bands, friendly girls and staff, and the place attracts fun customers.
Highly recommended.
Hotel_Name: NewYuthBarพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent after sun facial spa
Review: On vacation and was over due for my bi-weekly facials. I generally do not like going to anyone besides my regular lady back home but I had no choice. Was lucky enough to find Nicha Clinic. Their after sun facial spa was excellent. Highly recommend. Extra charge for extraction but it is not much and they also do an excellent job on that. Very clean, very luxurious, my face feels excellent! Even better than my regular lady at home.
Hotel_Name: NichaClinicPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Nicha Taxi Pattaya
Review: I’ve been using this taxi service for years every time I come to Thailand. Very reliable, always on time and polite drivers. Fair pricing for the service. Highly recommended to anyone landing in Swampy and looking for private taxi service.
Hotel_Name: NichaTaxiPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: I'm on my third great suit
Review:
All the tailors in Pattaya look the same from the outside. I took my chances with Nini based on an online review and I couldn't be happier I did. What impressed me most the first time was there was no obnoxious upsell. It was only when Peter was writing up the invoice for the suit that I decided I might like some shirts. I wasn't even sure Nini made shirts because I've never been to a tailor who didn't ask, "Would you like shirts with that?"

I think I had two fittings for that suit, and the moment I tried on the finished suit, I ordered another one.

I was back in Pattaya six months later and top of my list of things to buy was another suit from Nini, which I did. That time I found out another great thing about Nini is they won't rush a suit. If they don't have enough time to make it well, they won't make it. I wasn't in Pattaya long enough for it to be finished, so I arranged for Peter to post it to me in Australia. It arrived a few weeks later and is every bit as good as the other two.

I've had awful experiences with tailors in Thailand, so I know Nini is a real find.
Hotel_Name: NiniFashionsพทยาไทย

Title: Good Tailor
Review: I have been shopping at Nini for many years. Peter and Pinky provide excellent tailoring service. They offer good very good clothes which are great value for money.
Hotel_Name: NiniFashionsพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent Massage
Review: Really great massage by friendly ladies located in a nice area of jomtien beach i had a relaxing oil massage no more back pain
Hotel_Name: NisaMassageหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Super Massage !
Review: Die Massage war sehr gut und intensiv. ich habe mich danach sehr gut gefühlt ist jedem zu empfehlen. Der Kaffee zuerst war sehr gut und sie sprechen deutsch was für die Verständigung sehr hilfreich war.
Hotel_Name: NisaMassageหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Excellent massages
Review:
Our first time going to this cozy, affordable massage place.

Literally 2 mins walk from the Centara Grand Mirage resort. The masseuses are kind and welcoming. The place is clean and spacious. THB200 for one hour foot massage is awesome!
Hotel_Name: OrawanMassageSpaพทยาไทย

Title: Best massage in Pattaya and unbeatable price.
Review: Me and my wife tried Orawan massage since it was very close to our hotel. We were welcomed by the owner. She was very helpful, kind and spoke perfect English. She explained very well all her massages. Her staff were all very professional and friendly. The massage was so good you can’t stop falling asleep. It was the most relaxing massage I’d ever had. My wife also had the full body warm aromatic oil massage that was heavenly. I highly recommend this one! Another thing that surprised us was the price for the massages. I didn’t expect getting this high quality massage for this price. Simply unbeatable. Do not hesitate to try this place cause you won’t be disappointed! You could come with your kids aswell since they also have a family room. It gets very full quickly so maybe you should book in advance. Well I would like to thank all the team and owner at Orawan for there great job. Will be back again for sure!
Hotel_Name: OrawanMassageSpaพทยาไทย

Title: โบสถ์สวยในพัทยา
Review: โบสถ์คริสเตียน สไตล์ ออโธดอกซ์ ตั้งอยุ่แถวตำบลนาเกลือ รูทรงแปลกตาและสวยงาม เปิดให้เข้าชมเียงบางช่วงเวลาของวันเท่านั้น
Hotel_Name: OrthodoxChristianChurchพทยาไทย

Title: เข้าไปดู แวะพักผ่อน
Review: เข้าไปเมื่อมีกิจกรมคะ ปกติไม่ได้เข้าไปเพราะเป็นคริสต์ แต่เข้าไปเพราะร่มรื่นและสงบดีมากๆ พอดีว่าช่วงนั้นที่ไปไม่ได้มีงานหรือกิจกรรมอะไร ทำให้ได้เดินดู รอบๆโดยร่วมร่มรื่นดีคะ ต่างจากพัทยาใต้มากๆ
Hotel_Name: OrthodoxChristianChurchพทยาไทย

Title: สนใจไปเที่ยวชม
Review: คริสตจักรที่น่ารักนี้ไม่มีส่วนเกี่ยวข้องกับประเทศไทย แต่ถ้าคุณเดินไปที่ Sanctuary of Truth คุณควรหยุดที่นี่
Hotel_Name: OrthodoxChristianChurchพทยาไทย

Title: ตำแหน่งที่ไม่ถูกต้อง
Review:
จงระวังให้มากสถานที่ไม่ดีไม่สามารถเข้าถึงคริสตจักรนี้ได้
รอบ ๆ รอบ ๆ ประมาณ 1 ชั่วโมงและอื่น ๆ . . . . .
ไม่มีถนนบนถนนคนไทยไม่รู้จักคริสตจักรนี้
ไม่ดีมากไม่ดีมากไม่ดีมาก
Hotel_Name: OrthodoxChristianChurchพทยาไทย

Title: คริสตจักรคริสเตียนออร์โธดอกซ์
Review:
โบสถ์ดีมากด้วยการออกแบบที่น่าสนใจดี
มีโบสถ์น้อยมากในพัทยา
รู้สึกยินดีที่ได้เห็นคริสตจักร ความรู้สึกทางจิตวิญญาณและสันติภาพเต็มรูปแบบสภาพแวดล้อม,
Hotel_Name: OrthodoxChristianChurchพทยาไทย

Title: สถานที่สำหรับ Orthotox Christian ไปเยี่ยมเยียนและสวดมนต์
Review: สถานที่ที่มีความสุขที่คุณสามารถเข้าร่วมบริการได้ตามกำหนดหรือเพียงแค่อธิษฐานด้วยตัวเองในช่วงเวลากลางวัน
Hotel_Name: OrthodoxChristianChurchพทยาไทย

Title: จุดที่ซ่อนไว้สำหรับคำอธิษฐานที่สงบสุข
Review:
หากคุณเป็นคริสเตียนรัสเซียออร์โธดอกซ์และต้องการที่จะอธิษฐานคริสตจักรเป็นสถานที่ที่ดีมากในการทำเช่นนั้น
เป็นเวลาเปิดทำการที่ยาวนาน (08:00 - 20:00 น.) เพื่อให้การมาเยือนเป็นไปอย่างยืดหยุ่นสถานที่อันเงียบสงบในนาเกลือยังเป็นประโยชน์
เมื่อเทียบกับการออกแบบตกแต่งภายในที่สมบูรณ์แบบของโบสถ์ออร์โธดอกซ์ในรัสเซียคริสตจักรนี้ดูเป็นเหมือนเดิม แต่มีไอคอนที่ดี
สถานที่ที่เหมาะสำหรับการสวดมนต์ทุกวันในระหว่างการเยือนเมืองพัทยา
Hotel_Name: OrthodoxChristianChurchพทยาไทย

Title: อัญมณีของสถานที่
Review: 5 ดาวที่สวยงามคุ้มค่าแก่การเข้าชมโบสถ์แห่งนี้เล็ก ๆ น้อย ๆ มันยังหาง่ายมาก Xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Hotel_Name: OrthodoxChristianChurchพทยาไทย

Title: OK
Review: นี่เป็นอีกโบสถ์ คุณมาที่นี่ ถ้าคุณต้องการจะไปสวดมนต์ ไม่มีอะไรพิเศษ ถ้าคุณเป็นนักท่องเที่ยวคุณจึงไม่ควรพลาด
Hotel_Name: OrthodoxChristianChurchพทยาไทย

Title: Pleasant place
Review: It's a very good place to stay for a hour or two to take a drink of beer,the staff is very cooperative and you can also enjoy the dance of lady boys I think
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Great bar
Review: I’ve been to oscars many times now and I really enjoy the small bar. Very friendly staff and drink prices are good. Looking forward to going back in February for my birthday see you next year 😊
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Mukava pub
Review: Hyvä ja ystävällinen palvelu! Paikka tosi hyvä, odottelimme viereiseen show'hun menoa ja saimma tosi ystävällisen palvelun. Toki kaverimme olivat tuttuja tässä paikassa. Kadullanolevista pöydistä näkee kadulla tapahtuvaa elämää ja vastapäisen paikan atleetit trimmailevat kroppiaan muutaman metrin päässä :)
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Lady Boy Antics
Review:
We came into Pattaya for dinner at an Indian restaurant but were a bit early so we headed to Boyz Town for a pre-dinner drink.

We ended up sitting on the open patio at Oscars, one of many gay bars clustered here, enjoying a beer and watching the antics of some of the lady boys as they pranced, danced and minced up the street.

Our waiter wore a large name tag identifying him as Big, which we assumed was his nickname, because he was a diminutive chap but with a very outgoing and somewhat forward personality.

It was a pleasant way to fill in half an hour, then we crossed the road to our Indian restaurant.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Super
Review: Absoluut niets op aan te merken. Je kunt we heerlijk rustig lekker op het terras zitten en genieten van een drankje zonder lastig gevallen te worden. Personeel is vriendelijk en prijzen zijn absoluut zeer redelijk.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Great place to people watch
Review:
Set in boyztown at the bottom, its a bar with friendly staff and a place to sit and enjoy a drink while watching the world go by, also on occasion I have seen the hip hop dancers preform outside who were once on Thailand's got talent.
Definitely worth a look.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Friendly and welcoming bar- open throughout the day/night
Review: Cosy bar- in a prime location in Boyztown. The attractive staff are very polite/friendly and accommodating- without being obtrusive. Welcoming cold towel offered on arrival- with free snacks with every drink. Tea/Coffee ( excellent) served. Several additional attractions offered- and 'themed' activities e.g. Paddies Day- Irish Coffee etc.. All in all- a great bar to 'chill'- and watch the world go by. Sports TV available/offered.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Посидеть для разнообразия
Review: В этоб баре устраивают "шоу", и вечером можно посидеть, попить коктейль, посмотреть это шоу. Так, для разнообразия - нормально)
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Okay bar for a quick beverage
Review:
The Oscars Bar in BoyzTown is amongst a collection of similar bars in the main corner of the street. We stopped in for one drink and the staff was friendly. They have sidewalk and inside seating. They also have a couple of floors inside, one selling clothing garments and the upper floor as a cruising space.

Opens at 10am daily and offers special priced beverages from 10a-6p.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Pleasant place
Review: It's a very good place to stay for a hour or two to take a drink of beer,the staff is very cooperative and you can also enjoy the dance of lady boys I think
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Great bar
Review: I’ve been to oscars many times now and I really enjoy the small bar. Very friendly staff and drink prices are good. Looking forward to going back in February for my birthday see you next year 😊
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Mukava pub
Review: Hyvä ja ystävällinen palvelu! Paikka tosi hyvä, odottelimme viereiseen show'hun menoa ja saimma tosi ystävällisen palvelun. Toki kaverimme olivat tuttuja tässä paikassa. Kadullanolevista pöydistä näkee kadulla tapahtuvaa elämää ja vastapäisen paikan atleetit trimmailevat kroppiaan muutaman metrin päässä :)
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Lady Boy Antics
Review:
We came into Pattaya for dinner at an Indian restaurant but were a bit early so we headed to Boyz Town for a pre-dinner drink.

We ended up sitting on the open patio at Oscars, one of many gay bars clustered here, enjoying a beer and watching the antics of some of the lady boys as they pranced, danced and minced up the street.

Our waiter wore a large name tag identifying him as Big, which we assumed was his nickname, because he was a diminutive chap but with a very outgoing and somewhat forward personality.

It was a pleasant way to fill in half an hour, then we crossed the road to our Indian restaurant.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Super
Review: Absoluut niets op aan te merken. Je kunt we heerlijk rustig lekker op het terras zitten en genieten van een drankje zonder lastig gevallen te worden. Personeel is vriendelijk en prijzen zijn absoluut zeer redelijk.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Great place to people watch
Review:
Set in boyztown at the bottom, its a bar with friendly staff and a place to sit and enjoy a drink while watching the world go by, also on occasion I have seen the hip hop dancers preform outside who were once on Thailand's got talent.
Definitely worth a look.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Friendly and welcoming bar- open throughout the day/night
Review: Cosy bar- in a prime location in Boyztown. The attractive staff are very polite/friendly and accommodating- without being obtrusive. Welcoming cold towel offered on arrival- with free snacks with every drink. Tea/Coffee ( excellent) served. Several additional attractions offered- and 'themed' activities e.g. Paddies Day- Irish Coffee etc.. All in all- a great bar to 'chill'- and watch the world go by. Sports TV available/offered.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Посидеть для разнообразия
Review: В этоб баре устраивают "шоу", и вечером можно посидеть, попить коктейль, посмотреть это шоу. Так, для разнообразия - нормально)
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: Okay bar for a quick beverage
Review:
The Oscars Bar in BoyzTown is amongst a collection of similar bars in the main corner of the street. We stopped in for one drink and the staff was friendly. They have sidewalk and inside seating. They also have a couple of floors inside, one selling clothing garments and the upper floor as a cruising space.

Opens at 10am daily and offers special priced beverages from 10a-6p.
Hotel_Name: OscarsGayBarByBeckพทยาไทย

Title: beautiful experience:
Review: what a wonderful place to visit...every kind of food dish you could dream of...kid friendly,great service,safe atmosphere...went with my girlfriend several times after dark...easy access from taxi or walking..always crowded croded but plenty of tables..
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: Loud music
Review:
Used to love going here
On my last visit the music was so loud you couldn't have a conversation. Considering most of the clientele are over 50. Not surprised it's quiet now
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: DON’T EVEN CONSIDER GOING.
Review:
I have been going to Pattaya on holiday for over 20 years and in the past always looked forward to sitting on the terrace at Panorama Pub to people watch and meet friends new and old both at Happy Hour and later in the evening.

This year things have changed, the bar is under new management and although it has been slightly renovated it has lost all of its old character. The Happy Hour prices aren’t as attractive as before. There is no draft beer or large bottles, no free nuts or food available to order, no promotions or raffle tickets distributed for a raffle on a Saturday evening which used to bring in crowds of both local boys and tourists. Thet staff all looked cheesed off just sitting around, not surprisingly as there weren’t any customers and no incentive for them to encourage customers to enter.

I know that the Gay scene has dramatically changed over the years but Panorama Pub although in a prime position isn’t trying to fit in with the new trend. What was once the Heart and Sole of Boys Town is now as dead as a Dodo.

Wake up new management and learn from the past innovative management before it is too late as this bar has so much potential.
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: Relaxed
Review: Meerdere avonden in Panorama bar doorgebracht. Relaxte bar met terrasje en veranda. Service is goed. Personeel is vriendelijk en vooral Su zorgt ervoor dat je snel geholpen wordt. Prijzen zijn er redelijk. Vanuit Panorama bar een mooi uitzicht op Boyztown en in het bijzonder de boyz boyz boyz club. Dat is helemaal niet vervelend.... Bar is netjes schoon. Je krijgt een hygiënisch doekje om je handen schoon te maken. Op tafel een bakje met nootjes. Goed om de avond door te brengen.
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: Nothing to write home about
Review: I had a pre-dinner drink most evenings this trip to Pattaya about 7pm and was the only customer there ... perhaps the lack of value of the happy hour was the cause?
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: Разогнались
Review: Вечером прогуливаясь, решили разогнаться над тай-мальчиками. Зашли пацанами под градусом и такие там коры мочили!!! А так конечно место на 3 бала все как то умотано, тайцы-ленивцы!
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: Best bar in boyztown
Review:
This is truly the best bar in boyzytown.

Great seating area to watch the world go past in Boyztown. Good prices for the area including happy hours.

Staff are lovely. The bar staff Nana can't do enough for you. The manager David is great. If you need to know anything he is your man.

Many local British people drink here who are really friendly.

This was more of a local than the pub down the road from my house. Friendly bar staff who will look after you. Great meeting point or somewhere to relax.

If you want to know anything this is the bar to go to. They will do what ever they can to help you.
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: Just a bar
Review:
Totally unsure what the hype is about. This is a very pleasant open fronted bar with fans. There is an ordinary range of bottled beers and spirits.

Nice for a beer before dinner but otherwise 'id est'.
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: Chilled Bar
Review:
I find this the best bar to go to in boyztown. When you're starting a night out it's perfect for watching the world go by while sipping some beers, spirits or cocktails.
The prices are reasonable however most places in boystown are more expensive than some of the other parts of pattaya. Having said that- pay 500 baht and get a loyalty card and you get 10% discount for life.
The staff are friendly - take time out to sit and talk and also provide cold towels and other little things which make a difference.
I would recommend anyone who is new to Pattaya coming here first to ease themselves in to the thai scene if the gogo bars are a bit intimidating for you!
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: nice evening for a drink
Review: first bar on the right as you go into boyztown, enjoyed a couple of evenings here, just having a drink chilling out with the Manager Nana, excellent host and wasn't pushy and a very nice guy, nice sat in the bar watching people doing their own thing around the Boyztown area, both evenings were good.
Hotel_Name: PanoramaPubพทยาไทย

Title: Great day out
Review: This is a good test of golf. Any golfer who has played it would tell you that it’s a 2 part course, there’s getting to the greens and then there’s the greens. They are very sloppy. If you have not played it before you will be carding 3 and 4 putts. The layout and condition is good. Golfers will always belly ache about aspects of a course when they’re playing badly, this course is designed to expose those weaknesses. Remember this is holiday golf so enjoy the heat, the company of your caddies, give every putt due consideration and simply enjoy the day.
Hotel_Name: PattaviaCenturyGolfClubบานบงไทย

Title: Jede Runde ein Erlebnis
Review: Ein toller Platz. Wer das nicht schätzt, hat keine Ahnung von Golf. Schnelle Greens, faires Layout. Und wenn die Caddies kein English sprechen, sollten wir uns nicht beschweren, sondern Thai lernen. Also seid froh, dass euch Hackern bei 35 Grad Celsius die Tasche gezogen wird. I ch schätze die Caddies sehr
Hotel_Name: PattaviaCenturyGolfClubบานบงไทย

Title: グリーンが高速で面白い
Review:
■ゴルフバー企画ツアー参加で行きました。
■以前はコース近辺の道路が悪かったが、
改善されて、パイナップル景色見ながら快適ドライブ。
■キャディ同伴で、歩き又はカート利用/別途費用、選択可。
■グリーン費はシーズンによりますが、比較的安い。
■グリーンに特徴有り、キャディに聞かないと分からない
高速箇所有りました。
高速グリーンは面白いが、慣れるのに苦労しました。
Hotel_Name: PattaviaCenturyGolfClubบานบงไทย

Title: Not so much.....,
Review:
Great layout, but unfortunately the Bunkers are a mess; literally rocks and pebbles and zero sand!?
Attempted to talk with management and was blown off!?
Unacceptable to say the least, needless to say I wouldn’t recommend this course for the money or value.
Hotel_Name: PattaviaCenturyGolfClubบานบงไทย

Title: Cheap but you get what you pay for.
Review: Pro's - cheap, nice layout, easy to walk, greens excellent. Con's - caddies don't speak english (even yardages), fairways very dry and patchy, restaurant - well just don't bother! This course is not farang friendly and definitely aimed at local Thais. They even allow Thai 6 balls - yes 6 people - to play together and as Thai golfers do not seem aware of golf etiquette you are in for a long round. 6 and 5 balls are not usual here and as caddies will NOT ever question a older Thai don't bother to ask about hurrying up, playing through, etc. Restaurant service is terrible and delivery of food can take longer than the round! Again Thai patrons seem to have a monopoly on the service with their food being delivered in preference to farang tourist who have ordered way before. Caddies lovely but english limited and as mine was brand new her "help" was non-existent which is a nightmare considering the treacherous greens. Not recommended for a farang.
Hotel_Name: PattaviaCenturyGolfClubบานบงไทย

Title: Super Golf
Review: Super place for a good round of golf. Caddies are not always well-trained, but the course is not particularly difficult. The greens are a challenge and hard to read, and fast. Golf carts are available, but the course is not difficult to walk. The fairways are in good condition as are the greens. Green fees, caddie fees and golf carts are a reasonable price. During off season, there are special rates to enjoy. The service in the restaurant can be a bit slow at times, but the menu is good with primarily Thai food. The dressing room for the women is in excellent condition and clean. The men's changing rooms, unfortunately, are not as well maintained. the golf shop is small but has a good choice of golfing items. Golf clubs can be rented. Traffic to the golf club for the most part is not a problem, although I would suggest that you avoid rush-hour traffic because of trucks.
Hotel_Name: PattaviaCenturyGolfClubบานบงไทย

Title: Good service
Review: Easy to organise online for a group of 10 of us on to meet at the port of Laem Chabang as we were coming in on a cruise ship. We arrived early and tried to arrange an earlier pick but we were unable to. We had a bit a communication barrier with our driver but he still was a good driver and we felt safe. We arranged a pick up time but we were running a bit late, so we called and arranged a later pick up which was great.
Hotel_Name: Pattaya4Leisureพทยาไทย

Title: Airport transfer
Review: I have used this company about a dozen or more times , both to and from Airport's in Bangkok. I've never had an issue , car has always been early , driver polite and knew where the hotels position was in my resort .
Hotel_Name: Pattaya4Leisureพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent service at an affordable price
Review: The advert for this company came up in a banner on the internet, and as was thinking of taking an ordinary taxi to Pattaya from Bangkok's Don Mueang Airport, I thought that I would explore this further. Email with this company was answered promptly and my confidence grew. In the event we were picked up in a very smart Toyota Fortuner and delivered to our hotel in Pattaya in style, and without a single problem. Four days later our pre-booked journey to Bangkok went equally as smoothly. I would certainly use this company again.
Hotel_Name: Pattaya4Leisureพทยาไทย

Title: Best Field at Pattaya 👍🏻👍🏻
Review: สนามดีมากๆ มีสนามหญ้า มีบอลลูน มีสนามซิม สนุกสุดๆ มันส์มากๆ จะมีทีมมา หรือไม่มีทางสนามก็จัดลงแข่งให้ เล่นแล้วไม่อยากเลิกเลย 🔫🔫
Hotel_Name: PattayaBattleFieldพทยาไทย

Title: The best Paintball
Review: สนามเพ้นท์บอลที่ดีที่สุด 🤩🤩 บีบีกันก็คือดีสุด อุปกรณ์ก็ใหม่ เพื่อนที่มาร่วมจอยกันดีมาก สนุกมาก มันมาก จะกลับมาอีกแน่นอน
Hotel_Name: PattayaBattleFieldพทยาไทย

Title: Amazing
Review: I loved this place and actually watching these fights was truly an experience and one that should experience if you enjoy combat sports! Enjoy!
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: Attenzione agli orari
Review: Dò tre stelle perchè l'orario d'inizio non era quello specificato, perciò ci siamo persi il primo incontro!! peccato perchè vedere per la prima volta gli incontri di muay thai è un esperienza unica.
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: Exciting, a bit scary - just a mad experience for boxing and non-boxing fans
Review: We went here with friends who got VIP tickets for us, so we were in the first row and could see and feel the sweat, blood and spittle fly. We had no idea what the running order would be but we soon found out that each fight was around 7 mins long and there were 9 or so fights. In the short breaks, the audience was dancing for a free t-shirt and the whole event was streamed live, which added to the excitement when you saw yourself on the big screen (not very flattering). However, I did feel for some of the fighters as they were 14 or 15 years old. Having said that, if the sport is a ticket to more freedom and seeing the world and they get something out of it, that has to be a good thing. I sometimes squirmed but the atmosphere was great plus it was a one-off and I have to say I'm pleased I experienced it this close up. Something different for me but one I won't forget
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: 좋아요
Review: 역시 태국 하면 무에타이인가요. 구경하고 싶었는데 아쉽게도 외관만 보았습니다. 다음에는 내부에서 경기도 직접 보고 싶어요
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent show
Review:
For a long time I wanted to see live Thai boxing, and used my short visit to Pattaya to make the dream come true. The arena is well managed and the show was great, with easy access, good seats, visual effects and loud "champions league" music. I watched 7 fights. The guys frighted like their life depends on it - their carriers certainly do. I could see no signs of fixed fights. The fighters were young but adults, and I enjoyed watching their respectful sportsmanship.
The whole arrangement is very commercial, and I was not offer to purchase any ticket but the VIP for 2000 Baht, which is expensive but worth it for me. Got a seat in second row, 7 meters from the ring. You may be able to get a better deal if you book through you hotel.
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: 很热闹
Review: 真正的泰拳感受，比walking street上的那个敞开的拳馆好多了。气氛非常热烈，主持人经常在休息间歇带动场下气氛，票可以找代理购买。
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: Смешно!
Review: Если это тайский бокс-то я балерина! Постановочные бои! Я прекрасно понимаю, что единственная награда боксеров это небольшой гонорар и не стоит выбивать из друг друга Здоровье, но если хотите посмотреть на настоящий тайский бокс, то стоит пойти зрителем на соревнования за титулы в вашем родном городе. Это действительно красиво.
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: круто
Review: Из 12 боев 4 было чемпионских, в том числе один женский. Все реально никаких танцев. Организация великолепная.А самое главное на десерт был Джеф Мовсон.Одно дело видеть по телевизору и совершенно другое воотчую. Бойцы после боев выходили в зал. Давали интервью и раздавали автографы. К сожалению Мовсон был в конце и в зал не вышел. У него автограф взять не удалось. О чем очень сожалею. Фото не выставляю т.к. снимал бои на видео. Впечатлений было море. Еще часа два колотило от избытка адреналина.
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: Old
Review: Yes this is a little run down but still a functioning facility. fight nights 2000b, $ 57.14us kinda costly.
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: We all loved it.
Review: 5 of us went, including 2 girls & a 20 year old. Everyone loved it and really got into it. The boxing was first rate, and these guys left nothing in the tank. This whole experience was quite exhilarating.
Hotel_Name: PattayaBoxingWorldพทยาไทย

Title: จุดชมวิวที่ป้ายพัทยาซิตี้
Review: ไปพัทยาตั้งหลายครั้ง เพิ่งมาแวะที่จุดนี้ครั้งแรก เคยมองเห็นแต่ไกลๆ แต่ครั้งนี้มาอยู่ที่จุดนี้ ตัวอักษรคำว่า Pattaya ใหญ่มากแต่คำว่า City เล็กนิดนึง ยังงัยรวมๆๆแล้วก็ดูดีถ้าดูไกลๆ โดยเฉพาะตอนค่ำคืนมีการเปิดไฟสว่างที่ตัวอักษรด้วย เวลามองวิวออกไปเห็นทั้งหาดพัทยาเหนือจรดใต้
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: วิวสวยมาก
Review: วิวทะเลสวยมาก แต่หาที่จอดรถยากมาก ภายในมีของที่ระลึกขาย เป็นกิจการของทหารเรือ เหมาะแก่การสักการะกรมหลวงชุมพรเขตอุดมศักดิ์ สามารถจุดปะทัดถวายได้
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: วิว 360 องศา
Review: นอกจากจะได้ชื่มชมกับวิวที่สวยงามแล้ว ยังได้ทำบุญสัการะเสด็จพ่อ ร.5 มีมุมสวยๆให้ถ่ายรูป และยังมีมุมสำหรับทานกาแฟ ชาเขียว ขนมปัง วิวดีสุดๆๆ
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: โอบล้อมวิวทิวทัศน์
Review:
จุดชมวิวจากยอดเขาพระตำหนัก จ.ชลบุรี
- วิวสวย อากาศดี
- มีวัด สามารถไหว้พระ ทำบุญ บริจาคทานได้
- มีเครื่องดื่มขายให้นักท่องเที่ยว
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: ที่ถ่ายรูปสำหรับพัทยา
Review: เป็นอีกที่ที่สวยที่สุดในเมืองพัทยาที่ห้ามพลาด มาถ่ายรูปเก็บวิว เก็บ บรรยากาศที่สบายและสวยมากๆ ที่มาแล้วควรไป
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: จุดชมวิวยอดเขาพระตำหนัก
Review: จุดชมวิว สำคัญที่วิวสวยมาก มองเห็นอ่าวพัทยา จากบนยอดเขาพระตำหนัก ที่นี่มีร้านกาแฟชื่อดัง coffee break ที่สามารถมานั่งชิล ดูวิวได้ แนะนำช่วงเช้า หรือเย็น เพราะตอนกลางวันแดดร้อนจัดมาก
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: วิวสวย
Review: ถ้าไปตอนกลางวันควรพกร่มไปด้วยเพราะแดดแรงมากจริงๆ วิวตอนค่ำน่าจะสวยกว่าตอนกลางวัน ที่จอดรถหายากหน่อยเพราะคนมาเยอะ
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: เห็นวิวตัวเมืองพัทยาจากที่สูง สวยงามดี
Review: สามารถเห็นวิวตัวเมืองพัทยาจากที่สูง สวยงามดี โดยเฉพาะในตอนกลางคืนจะเห็นแสงไฟสาดส่องระยิบระยับ กลางวันก็จะเป็นวิวธรรมชาติดูสวยงามไปอีกแบบหนึ่ง
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: ิวิวสวยมาก และมีร้านกาแฟชมวิว
Review: ด้านบนสามารถเห็นวิวของเมืองพัทยา และมีวัด รวมถึงร้านกาแฟและขนมที่สามารถนั่งชมวิวตัวเมืองพัทยาได้จากจุดนี้
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: ชอบมากๆ
Review: วิวสวยมากกกกกกกกกกกกกกกกก คิดแล้วอยากมีบ้านอยู่แถวนี้มากกกๆ เลยคะ น่ามาท่องเที่ยวมาก พัทยานี้สวรรค์ของคนเมืองจริงๆ
Hotel_Name: PattayaCitySignViewpointพทยาไทย

Title: Thai food and Baking coursework
Review:
The most interesting issues with Thai cooking, which is relatively simple, is the complexity of the ingredients. To the Western eye, the spices, herbs and vegetables seem mundane. Yet upon more extensive examination, there are huge medicinal values to the ingredients that make this course one of appreciation of natural ingredients. Thai food is low in calories yet high in vitamins, minerals and nutrition.

There is a problem with communication in that the English spoken, however if you can bear with it, they have something to offer.
Hotel_Name: PattayaCookerySchoolพทยาไทย

Title: Good school
Review:
I got my certificate after finishing the Basic and Advanced Fruit/Vegetable Carving course at Pattaya Cookery School.
This school feels like family. I had Thai and French classmates. My teachers were good especially Ms. Yui and mama. I really appreciate them.
私は 無事 Pattaya Cooley school で
Fruite & Vegetable Carving を課程を習得しました。
とても ファミリー的なスクールで タイ料理とカービングのクラスをやっています
私はベーッシクコースとアドバンスこコースを選択。
私の他にもタイ人とフランス人がいました
先生は4人で なかでのも ユイ先生は抜群に素晴らしい技術を持った方です
Hotel_Name: PattayaCookerySchoolพทยาไทย

Title: Too bad to fully describe
Review:
It is difficult to fully describe just how bad this experience was.
I paid nearly £40 for the following:-

Having booked I was invited to choose a menu I wished to cook and told that dishes and cooking techniques would be fully explained and that ingredients would be fresh and variable.
When I arrived for my lesson in Thai cooking I was suppressed to see mince pork out in a hot kitchen which had obviously been out for some time.
The teacher spoke not a word of English though I was told he would be fluent.
The ingredients looked tired and limp, to be honest so did the dirty kitchen.
Are you ready for this????? Whilst preparing food a RAT I kid you not a RAT ran across the table. I pointed this out to the ‘chef’ and he just laughed.
At the end of the cooking process we sat down to eat the food when the owner came to join us and ate the food too. She then invited me to help cleaning the dishes.
I am a fully trained chef and have been in catering for 40 years. The chef’s knife skills were appalling and equipment dirty.
Miss this place like the plague, if you don’t you might catch it.
Hotel_Name: PattayaCookerySchoolพทยาไทย

Title: ความสนุกกับโลมาที่สัมผัสได้จริง
Review:
การบริการและการดูแล เรื่องสถานที่นั้นดีมาก
ไม่ต้องเดินทางไปต่าสงประเทศเพื่อดูโลมาโชว์
ที่มีมาตรฐานแบบสากล ใกล้ๆที่พัทยา
ประทับใจคนทุกวัย สนุกด้วยรอยยิ้ม
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: โลมาทริป
Review:
ประทับใจ

นั่งที่ VIP ใกล้ชิดกับโลมามาก

ถ่ายรูปกับ Seal และโลมาก็สนุกดี ใกล่ชิดดี

โชว์สนุก

สถานที่ ไม่มีรถส่วนตัวมายากหน่อย
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: คนรักโลม่าต้องมาเท่านั้น
Review:
ไปมา 2 ครั้งแล้ว และจะมีครั้งที่ 3 ในเร็วๆนี้ค่ะ Staffน่ารักและใส่ใจทุกคน ไม่ 10 ให้ 10
มีโอกาสได้ว่ายน้ำกับปลาโลมา ประทับใจมากกก ไม่มีที่ติค่ะ :)
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: โชว์โลมาครั้งที่2
Review: มาจากเชียงใหม่ดูครั้งแรกเดือนกรกฏาคม 63 เด็กๆชอบมากจนขอมาอีกรอบในเดือนถัดมาเป็นโชว์ที่สนุกที่สุดเท่าที่เคยดูมาค่ะ
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: Natnatoey
Review: พาลูก 1 ขวบไปดูสนุกดีค่ะ น่ารัก แตข้างในร้อนไปหน่อย ระบายอากาศไม่ค่อยดี ทำให้เวลาเด็กๆๆร้อนแล้วงองแงหลายคนเลยค่ะ ที่จอดรถยังไม่เป็นระเบียบ
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: สนุกมากครับ
Review: โชว์สนุกมากครับ โลมากับแมวน้ำแสดงได้เก่งมาก คุ้มค่ากับราคาครับ สถานที่สะอาดและยังใหม่อยู่ อยากจะไปดูอีกรอบเลย
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: ไม่แนะนำให้ซื้อการถ่ายรูปกับปลาโลมา
Review: คนกดชัตเตอร์สักแต่ว่าถ่ายรูปไม่โฟกัสเลย อย่าเชื่อที่พนักงานบอกว่าคนกดชัตเตอร์ถ่ายสวย และมุมถ่ายรูปติดนักท่องเที่ยวคนอื่นที่เข้าแถวยืนรอเยอะมาก ถ้าใช้ photoshop รีทัชคนออกไม่เป็นจะได้ฉากเป็นคนต่อแถว
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: เวลาของครอบครัว
Review: เป็นที่ที่เหมาะกับทุกคนในครอบครัว สนุกและปลาโลมาน่ารักมาก คนฝึกก็เก่งๆกันทุกคน โดยเฉพาะคนบรรยายระหว่างโชว์ Entertains ทุกคนได้สนุกมากๆ
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: การแสดงปลาโลมาที่ดีที่สุดในประเทศไทย
Review: การแสดงปลาโลมาที่ดีที่สุดในประเทศไทย ทุกคนในครอบครัวชอบมาก เด็กได้มีโอกาสว่ายน้ำกับปลาโลมา ประทับใจสุดๆเลยครับ
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: ครอบครัวหรรษา
Review: เป็นประสบการ์ณที่สนุก และประทับใจมาก ถ้ามีโอกาสจะไปชม และแนะนำคนอื่นให้มาสัมผัสด้วยตัวเองสักครั้งในขีวิตค่ะ
Hotel_Name: PattayaDolphinariumพทยาไทย

Title: Unbelievable experience
Review: What an incredible experience to learn and interact with these amazing creatures. The tour was fantastic. Renu, Panya , and family were excellent hosts . I would highly recommend this tour . I will definitely come back. It was one of the best days of my life and the highlight of my Thailand trip. Thank you so much Renu & Panya for sharing your love and compassion for Somkid, Frankie, and Thangthai. The food was excellent as well. TerryK🙏
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: Great Experience
Review: My family liked this experience more than we thought we would. Feed, walk with, bathe the 3 elephants. May sound mundane, but it's not. Do it. You won't regret it. May seem a little pricey, but once you see what you get (transfers, lunch, food for elephants) you'll get your money's worth. Sort of unbelievable that they can take care of these 3 voracious eaters just on what they make from the slow trickle of tourists right now. It's worth every penny!
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: Great, authentical and ethical experience!
Review: Wonderful experience in Pattaya Elephant Sanctuary. Renu and her family have rescued 3 elephants - Somkid (1967), Frank (2014) and Thangthai (1978) - which they give an elephant life here. No shows, back rides and chains, just being an elephant, going into the jungle, splashing in the water, eating good and healthy food and playing with each other. Elephants are often mistreated here in Thailand. That’s why we love what Renu and her family do. We love the experience. We walked with them in the jungle, watched and fed them. That was great, natural, ethical, authentical! Good to see that the elephants quickly got used to us and posed with us without any pressure. This is the way it should be everywhere. So if you love animals, I am sure you love this place. It’s not cheap but worth every baht because you do something good at the same time: supporting a better life of the elephants. With more support they want to rescue more elephants. Feels good! Highly recommended!
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: 코끼리와 친구될수있는곳
Review:
이곳은 코끼리않괴롭히는곳이고 친구될수있습니다
세마리코끼리는 정말행복해보입니다
주인되는 분들도 재미있고 코끼리를 정말로 사랑하는것처럼보입니다
적극추천 합니다
👏
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: Amazing.
Review: Perfect day, knowledgable staff, 100% elephant friendly, the right way to see these amazing animals.
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: Great experience
Review: The sanctuary has 3 elephants who have been rescued. They have an English speaking guide who can tell you about the elephants and their stories. We had a lovely morning feeding them, walking with them and even having a dip with them. The pace was easy-going and set by the elephants. Tips: wear closed shoes for the jungle walk and dress appropriately for the elephant bath bearing in mind that the showers afterwards at the centre are outdoors.
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: An Amazing Day
Review:
This was an amazing afternoon, to be able to be so close up to the elephants, to feed them, to walk with them and then to be able to bath them was brilliant.

The three elephants are lovingly cared for and looked after by all the volunteers / staff, the visit moves at the speed that the elephants feel like moving at or little Fred feels it should be moving at.

I can highly recommend a visit to the Pattaya Elephant Sanctuary, to see elephants doing what elephants want to do, not performing circus tricks.

The sanctuary exists on revenue from our visits, please support this, to enable them to save more wonderful elephants, who deserve a better life.
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: Super ervaring!
Review: De dieren worden op de beste manier behandeld. En komen uit eigen beweging tot bij u, zeer rustige en vriendelijke dieren. Ik ben een maand in Thailand geweest en dit was mijn allerbeste ervaring.
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: Amazing! No cruelty, no riding - just love!
Review:
Can’t even begin to describe how amazing this place is. The 3 elephants are treated with the utmost love.

No bullhooks
No whips/chains
NO RIDING

The staff and mahouts enable you to interact with these beautiful animals in their natural environment.
First we prepared and fed the elephants chopped fresh fruit, then we had a leisurely walk through the jungle, watching the elephants eat the trees and leaves and chew bark.
Then we washed the elephants clean before they had a dip in the pool.

The elephants are not forced to do anything they don’t want to do, they are treated with love and respect at all time’s.

Some of the other ‘sanctuary’s’ should take a leaf out of their book.

A MUST visit if you love animals and want to see and interact with them in a cruelty free manner. Ethical tourism at its finest!

Love to you all ❤️
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: Conscious Tourism
Review:
One of the few elephant sanctuary around. My kids made sure they visited an ethical no-ride elephant haven.
What an amazing experience they had and I know they will always remember this experience for the rest of their lives.
This place rescues injured, old and abused elephants and cares for them. As part of the activities, you get to prepare their meals, fed them, walk them out in the jungle and the best part is bathing them right after.
All proceeds goes directly to their care. Please don’t confuse them with other elephant villages in Pattaya.
A bucket list fulfilled by our family
Hotel_Name: PattayaElephantSanctuaryบานบางเสรไทย

Title: ตลาดของถูก
Review: มีของขายมากมาย เสื้อผ้า และของฝาก รวมถึงของที่ระลึกด้วย เหมาะกับการมาชอปปิ้งของถูกและมีให้เลือกหลากหลาย
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: สินค้าหลากหลาย ราคารับได้
Review: ตลาดกลางคืนติดถนนพัทยาสายสอง มีร้านค้าจำนวนมากทั้งขายเสื้อผ้า รองเท้า กระเป๋า และสินค้าอื่นๆ สินค้ามีให้เลือกหลากหลาย ราคาเมืองท่องเที่ยวพอรับได้ ต่อรองได้
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: ไม่ค่อยคึกคักเลย
Review: เหมือนตลาดไนท์บาร์ซ่าทั่วไปค่ะ ขายของที่ระลึก ของฝากสำหรับนักท่องเที่ยว แต่ที่นี่เงียบน้อยเพราะไม่ใช่ไฮไลท์ของพัทยา 555
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: ตลาดไนท์บาซ่า
Review: มีร้านของเสื้อผ้า ร้านขายของที่ระลึก เยอะแยะมากมาย มีสินค้าแปลกๆเยอะ เป็นแหล่งสำหรับชอปปิ้งกลางเมืองพัทยา
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: ของที่ระลึกมากมาย
Review: พัทยาเป็นจุดแวะพักสุดท้ายของการเดินทางมาประเทศไทยก่อนบินกลับบ้าน เรามีความสุขกับตลาดกลางคืน (ซึ่งเปิดให้บริการตั้งแต่ช่วงบ่าย) มันมีแผงขายของที่ระลึกสำหรับของขวัญในนาทีสุดท้าย อาจไม่ใช่ราคาที่ถูกที่สุด แต่ก็ไม่แพงที่สุดเช่นกัน บางคนจะต่อรองราคา แต่หลายคนก็ไม่ได้ซึ่งเราพบหัวข้อร่วมกันตลอดการเดินทาง แม้ว่าฉันจะต่อรองกับประสบการณ์ครั้งสุดท้ายของฉัน สนุกดี!
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: knockoffs คุณภาพต่ำ
Review:
ควรค่าแก่การเดินเล่นหากคุณไม่มีอะไรให้ทำ
ไม่มีอะไรจะซื้อจริง ๆ ของปลอมคุณภาพต่ำมาก (ซึ่งดูปลอม ๆ ) . . .
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: พัทยาไนท์บาซาร์สำหรับนักเดินทางท่องเที่ยว
Review:
ตลาดโต้รุ่งที่ฉันมีโอกาสได้สัมผัส Pattaya Night Bazaar เป็นหนึ่งในสิ่งที่เลวร้ายที่สุด
ไม่มีการเคารพต่อลูกค้าและผู้ขายตามขอบเขตของความไม่สุภาพ
คนไทยน้อยมากที่เดินเล่นซึ่งให้ความคิดเกี่ยวกับคุณภาพของผลิตภัณฑ์และราคาที่เรียกเก็บ
ขาตั้งทั้งหมดขายสินค้าชนิดเดียวกันและราคาสูงกว่าราคาปกติสองหรือสามเท่าถูกสร้างขึ้นเพื่อ "หัวหน้าฝรั่ง" ซึ่งเชื่อว่าเขาได้รับข้อเสนอที่ดี
ของปลอมคุณภาพต่ำและหยาบจำนวนมากถูกขายให้กับนักท่องเที่ยวที่ไร้เดียงสาซึ่งจะพอใจบริการศุลกากรของประเทศเมื่อพวกเขาลงจากเครื่องบิน
ฉันจะไม่เสียเวลาที่ Pattaya Night Bazaar อีกต่อไป
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: ที่เดียวที่ฉันไปช็อป ...
Review: ถึงแม้ว่าร้านค้าส่วนใหญ่จะจำหน่ายของที่คล้ายกัน แต่ก็เป็นหนึ่งในสถานที่ที่จะได้รับทุกสิ่งที่คุณต้องการตั้งแต่เสื้อผ้าไปจนถึงของที่ระลึก . . อย่าลืมต่อรองราคาเพราะบางร้านเริ่มต้นด้วยราคาที่สูงมาก . . บางคนข้ามความยุ่งยากและให้อัตราที่ต่ำ ใช้เวลาสำรวจราคาก่อนซื้ออะไร
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: ตลาดโต้รุ่งพัทยาจอมเทียน
Review: ตลาดกลางคืนที่ดีจริง ๆ ล็อตตาหูเครื่องดื่มและร้านค้า บรรยากาศที่ผ่อนคลาย และมันก็เป็นงานรื่นเริงมาก
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: ตลาดที่ดี
Review: เรามีความสุขกับคอกม้าพร้อมกับตู้ปลาแทะเล็ม ผ่อนคลายมากและราคาดีมากเมื่อเทียบกับที่อื่นในพัทยา แผงขายชาและเครื่องเทศก็มีราคาที่ดีเช่นกัน แต่แผงขายของที่ระลึกของไทยจำนวนมาก
Hotel_Name: PattayaNightBazaarพทยาไทย

Title: Pattaya Taxis are the worst and they are the reason that you should not visit Pattaya at all
Review:
If possible, NEVER EVER sit in a taxi in Pattaya.

Not any of the taxis in Pattaya will go by taximeter, they just say that it is standard price. Their standard price is almost three times as much as the taximeter would show. Our first night here they wanted 200 Baht for a short trip and we asked many different taxis, we just said "NO WAY" and walked instead. The trip should have been like 70 to 80 Baht in the beginning, but when we had walked closer, it should have been minimum price and they still said 200 Baht, one taxi even asked for 300 Baht.

Today we asked for a trip to Nong Nooch Botanical Garden and that is a trip of about 25 kilometers and should have costed around 250 Baht according to the Taxi's own overview of fares (which we found in the pocket in the back of the front seats). They started with 700 Baht, and went quickly down to 500 Baht, but we got the trip for 400 Baht after some haggling. On the return trip it was not possible to haggle at all so the price was 500 Baht.

The worst thing is that it seems that the hotels are also into this, it might be that they get some percentage if they call for a taxi.

Some even call these the Taxi Mafia.
Hotel_Name: PattayaTaxiServicesพทยาไทย

Title: Back to Bangkok
Review: Good efficient service, on time clean car polite driver. Quick booking fair price will certainly use again probably as early as next week.
Hotel_Name: PattayaTaxiServicesพทยาไทย

Title: A Rip Off
Review:
Notorious Pattaya taxi services that won't run on the meter!

Beware, this is ubiquitous throughout Pattaya and will typically charge 'twice' what the fare should be since the meter's off.

Do not get in a Pattaya taxi till the meter is 'on'.

They will physically threaten you unless you pay the exorbitant fee.

Pattaya has no functioning government arm to oversee this scam.
Hotel_Name: PattayaTaxiServicesพทยาไทย

Title: Fit im Urlaub
Review: Wenn sich jemand in seinem Urlaub fit halten möchte, dabei einen Einblick vom Thaiboxen sich verschaffen will, dann ist er hier super aufgehoben! Kein CHI CHI, kein Luxus , keine klimatisierten Räume, sondern Bodenständigkeit & Einfachheit, aber auch günstig! Toller Tipp, danke
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Faule, lustlose Trainer
Review:
Meine Freundin und ich (beide Kampfsportaktiv) wohnten nur 2 Straßen weiter und do bot es sich an, dort zu trainieren.

Leider waren die beiden Trainer faul und lustlos.
(Wir waren an dem Tag bis dahin die einzigen Kunden)

Mein Trainer weigerte sich sogar,die mit dem Chef vereinbarten Runden an Pratzentraining zu machen.

Das Pratzentraining an sich war eintönig und langweilig.

Wir hatten ursprünglich vor, täglich zu kommen, aber so fuhren wir enttäuscht zurück ins Hotel.

Leider nicht zu empfehlen.
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Amazing place to keep fit while on holiday
Review: Great place to stay in shape. They have all what you need to train weight lifting and then then offer you private lessons in Thai Boxing. Also for beginners. A fantastic and varied form of training that will keep the most trained person in great shape. Can only recommend the place! Great owner as well 👍
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Good Training me Adult and Son 7 years
Review: My Son 7 Years. Never trained before Thaiboxing. He take first 10 x Lessions. Training for him was very good. Good Training for Children. I trained 2 years not. Also very good training with my 45 years.
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Excellent gym for boxing and fitness
Review: I've worked out at this gym several times and I strongly recommend. Naturally, because it's open air it's very hot. But that's part of what makes it a great workout. The evening is better for lower heat. The gym has plenty of equipment for strength and fitness training, but it's best for boxing in my opinion. The cost is very reasonable and they have boxing trainer with good skill sets (they usually like to start later in the day, I'm a morning person). Location is good as it's not far from primary tourist spots.
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Thai boxing Jomtien
Review:
I trained here for a week in January. I wish it was longer! I really enjoyed my training will be back next year.

Location:
About 5 min walk from jomtien beach rd with food, 711s etc close by. Lars (owner) + my instructor Uan were v friendly and helpful.

Training:
Gym use was free all day if had session with instructor. My sessions were 1 hour of 1-1 with Uan. pads and clinch plus sparring if wanted. 30min (solo) warmup was encouraged every time a session was booked.

Facilities for thai boxing:
Headguards, gloves etc available to borrow. 2 boxing rings each with 3+ bags and 1 wall bag. Floor around front ring is padded (+ clean). Changing rooms, showers
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Super Flexible Training
Review:
My 2 Daughters used the Training Facilities everyday and also did 1 Hours Kick Box Instruction at varies times.

The Staff were Great with them and it worked out to be Fantastic Value for Money
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Спорт
Review: Всегда с удовольствием посещаю такие места, интересно оснащение, чистота, публика, цены. Здесь гармония во всем, плюс свежий морской воздух. Утром лучше, свежее.
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Коротали жаркие дни
Review: С маленькими детьми конечно много времени не выкроишь для спорта, но нам было удобно, что спортзал находится недалеко от нашего кондо и дороги. Есть тренеры, много иностранцев, но я предпочитаю самостоятельно заниматься! В основном беговые дорожки.... Либо пресс... С интересом можно понаблюдать обучение муай-таю (может и немного неверно написала, но суть ясна). Просто и в то же время то, что надо.
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Зал
Review: Если вы решили остановиться в паттайе на длительный срок, то этот зал поможет поддержать форму. Хорошие тренеры и недорогое посещение.
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Fit im Urlaub
Review: Wenn sich jemand in seinem Urlaub fit halten möchte, dabei einen Einblick vom Thaiboxen sich verschaffen will, dann ist er hier super aufgehoben! Kein CHI CHI, kein Luxus , keine klimatisierten Räume, sondern Bodenständigkeit & Einfachheit, aber auch günstig! Toller Tipp, danke
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Faule, lustlose Trainer
Review:
Meine Freundin und ich (beide Kampfsportaktiv) wohnten nur 2 Straßen weiter und do bot es sich an, dort zu trainieren.

Leider waren die beiden Trainer faul und lustlos.
(Wir waren an dem Tag bis dahin die einzigen Kunden)

Mein Trainer weigerte sich sogar,die mit dem Chef vereinbarten Runden an Pratzentraining zu machen.

Das Pratzentraining an sich war eintönig und langweilig.

Wir hatten ursprünglich vor, täglich zu kommen, aber so fuhren wir enttäuscht zurück ins Hotel.

Leider nicht zu empfehlen.
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Amazing place to keep fit while on holiday
Review: Great place to stay in shape. They have all what you need to train weight lifting and then then offer you private lessons in Thai Boxing. Also for beginners. A fantastic and varied form of training that will keep the most trained person in great shape. Can only recommend the place! Great owner as well 👍
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Good Training me Adult and Son 7 years
Review: My Son 7 Years. Never trained before Thaiboxing. He take first 10 x Lessions. Training for him was very good. Good Training for Children. I trained 2 years not. Also very good training with my 45 years.
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Excellent gym for boxing and fitness
Review: I've worked out at this gym several times and I strongly recommend. Naturally, because it's open air it's very hot. But that's part of what makes it a great workout. The evening is better for lower heat. The gym has plenty of equipment for strength and fitness training, but it's best for boxing in my opinion. The cost is very reasonable and they have boxing trainer with good skill sets (they usually like to start later in the day, I'm a morning person). Location is good as it's not far from primary tourist spots.
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Thai boxing Jomtien
Review:
I trained here for a week in January. I wish it was longer! I really enjoyed my training will be back next year.

Location:
About 5 min walk from jomtien beach rd with food, 711s etc close by. Lars (owner) + my instructor Uan were v friendly and helpful.

Training:
Gym use was free all day if had session with instructor. My sessions were 1 hour of 1-1 with Uan. pads and clinch plus sparring if wanted. 30min (solo) warmup was encouraged every time a session was booked.

Facilities for thai boxing:
Headguards, gloves etc available to borrow. 2 boxing rings each with 3+ bags and 1 wall bag. Floor around front ring is padded (+ clean). Changing rooms, showers
Hotel_Name: PattayaThaiBoxingandFitnessGymหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Review:

The Staff were Great with them and it worked out to be Fantastic Value for Money
