Hotel_Name: TaxiPattayaAllTourพทยาไทย

Title: Himmlische Massage
Review: Ich hatte eine Pattaya Secret Massage und eine Fußmassage. Beide waren sehr entspannend. Das Ambiente war sauber, das Personal sehr freundlich und der Ausblick auf das Meer während der Massage zusätzlich entspannend.
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Hospitable staffs w/ good treatments. Recommended!!
Review:
The receptionist was very hospitable and kind.
I forgot the therapist’s name, but she has really good skills. Massage is not that strong, but I feel refreshment afterwards. It’s lucky that my mom & I had treatments at Tea Tree Spa to relieve our fatigue. I will definitely get massage treatments at this spa again if I visit Pattaya in the future:)
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Great service.
Review: I had a tea tree signature massage and hot stone massage and facial the next day. A most wonderful experience from start to finish and an excellent method. The treatments are marvellous and massage therapist Vipa is highly recommended.
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Tea tree spa
Review: Fantactic aroma massage. Love the lavender oil. Highly recommend K.Wipa for the course. Professional, great and soft hand, good service mind.
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: pattaya
Review: this massage very nice ms.wanpen very good massage I like her so much and all staff service is very very beautiful. I like it
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: spa初嘗試
Review: 之前未曾試過做spa，經旅遊書介紹就來了tea tree spa。我們的therapist是wipa and namfon，做了90分鐘的精油按摩，感覺她們都很professional的，推薦推薦👍🏻
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Amazing spa experience
Review: Thanks to my therapist Susan, Veerawan and Picy for their wonderful spa experience for me. Very clean and well organised, friendly and skilled therapists make this spa worth the indulgence.
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Lovely place, totally worth!
Review: The therapist Ms.Sunan was so skillful. The massage room is clean and nice. I bought voucher at Thai Teaw Thai which was so cheap. But even if I have to pay full price, it would be worth paying! Recommended!
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Very good, very relaxing
Review:
I came here twice during my stay at the Holiday Inn and it was really good. I had aromatherapy massage with Pattaya Sunrise Oil. The masseuse, Khun Susan is very nice and thoughtful.

When you arrive, you will be given 3 options of oil. A fresh water lemon was served after and then when you're ready, your feet will be cleaned. The masseuse then bring you to a private room. You'll have your own wardrobe plus safety box, shower and toilet.

The ambiance is just so calming. It's not cheap, but good value considering its in the hotel and everything about it. It's worth it and I'll definitely come back if i had the chance.
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Thai massage for 9 people
Review: New environment, professional massage teahniques, and cordial hospitality.Keep quiet during massage andlet customers enjoy a comfortable hour. Finally, I also presented a cup of ginger tea and a suger free dessert, very thoughtful.
Hotel_Name: TeaTreeSpaatHolidayInnPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: "Great ambience and colorful settings with alot of warmth atmosphere"
Review: Had three different massages, oil, Thai and foot massage all did the job that it was intended to do. Feel great. Try them on your next trip.Now pain free.
Hotel_Name: ThaiBestThaiMassageandSpaหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: "Great ambience and colorful settings with alot of warmth atmosphere"
Review: This ia a massage shop on Jomtien Beach Road. The staff are very friendly and of course they give great massage, all different varieties and a great way to spend a couple of hours there. Try them next time, opposite the bay of Jomtien Beach. The Baht bus runs there all day long the fare 10 Baht from all over Pattaya to Jomtien beach. Have fun.
Hotel_Name: ThaiBestThaiMassageandSpaหาดจอมเทยนไทย

Title: Terrific
Review: Totally terrific 2hr Thai massage. Be prepared to either wear your undies or street clothes (your choice). Very large Russian contingent of customers. Some of the masseuse were even speaking Russian with their clients. Environment is not fancy. The price is right and the massages very good.
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: Я смогла восстановить силы и здоровье после серьезных стрессов
Review: Я приехала после тяжелых моральных травм: смерть матери, через пару месяцев отъезд детей заграницу и еще через месяц болезненный разрыв 12летних отношений. давление, сердце....депрессия. За месяц пребывания в Таиланде, делая массаж почти каждый день я не только оздоровилась, ко мне вернулись бодрость и жизнерадостность, под конец отдыха гоняла на скутере, прыгала с парашютом и даже научилась кататься на флайборде. В этом году хочу опять поехать. Знакомые и друзья были в восторге от того как я помолодела....Спасибо огромное и до встречи))
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: Good massage
Review: I never expected so good massage by blind man. Very good massage. I tried oil massage first and later Thai massage as well.
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: 日本の指圧に近いマッサージ
Review:
パタヤに行く際は、必ず立ち寄るマッサージ。
価格も手ごろでエアコンルームかノンエアコンルームかをチョイスできるので、ありがたい。
女性には女性。男性には男性の施術師を充ててくれるのでコリのひどい人でも満足できるのではないだろうか。
場所が少しわかりにくいけど、ケイプダラ・リゾートの近く。
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: Не поленитесь, почитайте отзыв.
Review: И так, только что вернулись с "массажа". Или я что то не понимаю в тайском массаже, или там работают..... не могу подобрать слово, но, не профессионалы, для них слишком громкое слово. Локтями и коленями надавливают на тело. Все! Было впечатление, что просто тянули время. Кто будет думать, что я ничего не понимаю и я "невежда"( специально заменил слово невежа) то для вас у меня прекрасные новости!!!!! Я открываю по всей России салоны тайского массажа!!! Цены как и в Таиланде!!! 500 р час!!!! Если серьезно, то дикий ужас, а не массаж. ЕДИНСТВЕННОЕ место, где берут деньги вперёд. Через 3 минуты хотелось встать и уйти. Но думал, раз столько хороших отзывов, подожду, может повезет??? Нет. Не дождался.... от тайского массажа там нет ни-че-го
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: Rude staff from reception to the masseuses
Review: Knowing what the place is and what it does and how it employs the blind folks to employment it’s very hard to honest about the reality of this place but I shall. From the moment you walk into the reception the staff are not very friendly or welcoming. I had a thai 1 hour dry massage. I was led into a room which had 4 customers in there having there massages. Note not all the staff are blind. The staff that did my massage was rude, making fun of me, the masseuses were talking and I could tell they were making fun of my weight (I have an average chunky European body) the massage itself was very painful and it was difficult to tell her even though at the reception I did say to them I want a medium pressure massage. Would I recommend this place NO! Even though it’s a great idea they have GOOD practices that they need to implement into this place before it can become a place worth going to!
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: Hard to beat
Review: If you get the right one then they can fix issues you have had for years. And some you didn't know you had. I have 2 hours to give them time to find and fix all the problems. I have been going there for over 10 years and all is good and 360 baht for 2 hours is hard to beat
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: Good and reasonable.
Review: I always have massage here when I visit Pattaya. Always experience a good and refreshing massage. Tell the receptionist your problem and she will suggest some suitable guy. Good luck and enjoy
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: Very professional massage
Review: Very professional massage made by blind people in a relaxing atmosphere. Also nice to enjoy in “after massage tea” in the patio.
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: many years of massage alays good
Review:
TBMI to us is an institution o Jomtien that we never miss. We attend heere every 2nd day when in Jomtien andd have done so for many many yeears.
New massuers this year, with a slightly different technique than the older guys.
I would like to compliment "Jack" for the best massage I have ever had in Thailandd over the past 20 years
Hotel_Name: ThaiBlindMassageInstituteพทยาไทย

Title: sanctuaire de la veritee
Review: endroit splendide a voir absolument et visiter la faune nocture a pattaya splendide en couleurs 1 a 2 jour max et le big bouddha dans la montagne
Hotel_Name: ThaiCulinaryClassatSheratonPattayaResortพทยาไทย

Title: Quite a relax resort
Review:
Hotel was far from Pattaya city center, if traveler is looking for relax holiday, here may be a good choice.

Hotel guestroom was in traditional/tropical interior design. Room was big and mine was assigned with a big balcony. There were lots of greens surrounding my room, each block of rooms with high privacy. Please do expect you may see some bug/insect in your room as the property itself was built with trees or plans around.

I did twice aromatic massage during my stay and the therapist were good too.

I had joined a 1.5 hrs cooking class as selection of group activities with a college as teammate. we had tried to make Tong Yum kong soup and the Thai Green Curry, the taste which chef instructed us were too strong or salty and not fit for Hong Kong people. Because he gave us the comment about the soup and curry we cooked were a bit light in taste! But we loved those we made ^^ finally, we were awarded a certificate of completion of this cooking class. So much fun!
Hotel_Name: ThaiCulinaryClassatSheratonPattayaResortพทยาไทย

Title: Sheraton pattaya for 35 And above
Review: This place has subtle feeling amidst the party town image of pattaya .. The entrance to the hotel is just great and the reception area overlooks the sea and it is beautiful .. Than there is a nice pool with good food .. It has its own man made beach which is not that great that's the only flaw .this place is uphill so from here a little walk here and there you will be able to see the entire city and it awes you .. Place is recommended to couples and people above 35 ... So have a trip ... Say hello
Hotel_Name: ThaiCulinaryClassatSheratonPattayaResortพทยาไทย

Title: Must go!!
Review: Amazing class. Really friendly staff. They made us feel like we were the only guests in the hotel. You choose the dishes your self. We cooked delicious food with help from the chef. After we could eat all the food (there was a lot) and received a certificate and a basket with some of the ingredients. We can warmly recommend this class.
Hotel_Name: ThaiCulinaryClassatSheratonPattayaResortพทยาไทย

Title: Sehr empfehlenswert
Review: War schon einige male mit Thai-ger-line unterwegs und kann es nur weiterempfehlen. Gut organisiert, schöne Plätze zum spielen, Golfplätze in jeder Preisklasse, klappte immer mit den Hin-und Rückfahrten und Fabian und Kik sind beide top.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent and very accomodating
Review:
We were a group 9 golfers that had booked a 13 game tour with Thai-Ger Line Golf during our stay we required to depart early due to Border closings. Thai-Er Line refunded all unused games no questions asked even though they are doing it hard.

We played 8 games with one added in at short notice with no fuss everything is taken care of for you buses always on time all you have to do is turn up and play.

I will not use a different company in Thailand ever again and can not recommend them highly enough.

Thank you Kik and Fabian you are exceptional people and run an exceptional business.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Deutsche Gründlichkeit mitten in Pattaya
Review:
Tolle und zuverlässige Organisation zu den Golfplätzen in der Region zu sehr fairen Preisen. Der Transfer zu den Plätzen (max. 1 Stunde Anreise klappt immer und man fühlt sich sehr sicher. Die vereinbarten Startzeiten werden eingehalten und es waren einfach perfekte Golftage.
Fabian und Kik sind zudem sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit und manchmal wird man sogar zum Familiendinner eingeladen :-).
Einfach klasse und sehr zu empfehlen!!
Bin seit 10 Jahren dort Kunde und werde es bleiben
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Golf Package
Review: Haben bei Thai-Ger Line in Pattaya ein Golfpaket(8 Runden) gebucht. Es waren ausnahmslos schöne bis sehr schöne Plätze. Die ganze Organisation war toll, alles lief hervorragend. Sollten wir wieder in der Gegend sein(sehr wahrscheinlich) wissen wir, an wen wir uns wenden. Preis/Leistungsverhältnis sehr gut.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: No fuss and well organised golf tours.
Review: Thai-Ger have day tours to some great golf courses. The tours are easily booked and all you need to do it turn up to the shop on time to jump on the mini bus and you are off to play golf for the day.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Dissapointing
Review:
Most of the courses are a good drive away and that will cost you most of the day, sometimes coming back when it’s dark.

Way too high a price added for the transportation

Often arrive at a golf course unexpected and or delayed t-times

Top golf courses in the proximity of Pattaya were not to be found on the playing list in the time I was there. Maybe, that changes following customer feedback.

Location of office, on worst street, (one of the real bad roads in Pattaya).

Never given discount when showing Pattaya Sports Club membership, although officially stated that there would be a discount when presenting the card.

Expect to pay for your partner also, hence I found an alternative.

This review is based upon my own experiences, with the remarks others mentioned to me that verified that I was not alone in my opinion.

You of course will have your own experiences, just be aware that what appears to be cheap is not always as it appears to be.
Especially for group bookings.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Best spot for Golfers! Super Golf-Touren!
Review:
Gott sei Dank habe ich Thai-Ger Line Golf gefunden!
So macht Golfspielen als Single-Golfer in der Umgebung von Pattaya Spaß!
Man spart sich die ganze Anmelderei und das Problem des wie-hinkommens und dann ist das ganze noch preisgünstiger.
Ich habe einmal einen Einzeltrip mit Hotelabholung gebucht, hat prima geklappt alles.
Aber viel besser sind die gemeinsamen Touren: Jeden Tag mit dem Thai-Ger Line Minibus zu einem anderen Golfplatz.
Anders könnte ich mir Golfen in Pattaya gar nicht mehr vorstellen!
Super, super, super!
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Best golf and hotel arrangements in and around Pattaya
Review:
Thai-Ger Line golf has set up our entire golf trips to Pattaya many times. Airport transfers, tee times, golf course transfers and hotel reservations are all well handled. Over the years we have had 8 trips and over 60 tee times set entirely up by Thai-Ger Line. The arrangements have always gone smoothly, always on time and exactly as we requested.
The courses around Pattaya are the best and the golf experience has always been outstanding. If you like great golf, beautiful courses, Thai-Ger Line will make it happen.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Sehr gut
Review: Sind nur Anfänger aber hatten auf dem Übungs Platz sehr viel Spaß. Dazu kommt, zuvorkommendes personell. Immer wieder gerne.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Une equipe efficace et super organisee pour les golfeurs
Review:
Vaste choix de packages golf, comprenant transport AR hotel-golf, green fee, cadye, voiturette. On joue sur des parcours internationnaux.
Nous y retournons cette annee. Faites comme nous.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Sehr empfehlenswert
Review: War schon einige male mit Thai-ger-line unterwegs und kann es nur weiterempfehlen. Gut organisiert, schöne Plätze zum spielen, Golfplätze in jeder Preisklasse, klappte immer mit den Hin-und Rückfahrten und Fabian und Kik sind beide top.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent and very accomodating
Review:
We were a group 9 golfers that had booked a 13 game tour with Thai-Ger Line Golf during our stay we required to depart early due to Border closings. Thai-Er Line refunded all unused games no questions asked even though they are doing it hard.

We played 8 games with one added in at short notice with no fuss everything is taken care of for you buses always on time all you have to do is turn up and play.

I will not use a different company in Thailand ever again and can not recommend them highly enough.

Thank you Kik and Fabian you are exceptional people and run an exceptional business.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Deutsche Gründlichkeit mitten in Pattaya
Review:
Tolle und zuverlässige Organisation zu den Golfplätzen in der Region zu sehr fairen Preisen. Der Transfer zu den Plätzen (max. 1 Stunde Anreise klappt immer und man fühlt sich sehr sicher. Die vereinbarten Startzeiten werden eingehalten und es waren einfach perfekte Golftage.
Fabian und Kik sind zudem sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit und manchmal wird man sogar zum Familiendinner eingeladen :-).
Einfach klasse und sehr zu empfehlen!!
Bin seit 10 Jahren dort Kunde und werde es bleiben
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Golf Package
Review: Haben bei Thai-Ger Line in Pattaya ein Golfpaket(8 Runden) gebucht. Es waren ausnahmslos schöne bis sehr schöne Plätze. Die ganze Organisation war toll, alles lief hervorragend. Sollten wir wieder in der Gegend sein(sehr wahrscheinlich) wissen wir, an wen wir uns wenden. Preis/Leistungsverhältnis sehr gut.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: No fuss and well organised golf tours.
Review: Thai-Ger have day tours to some great golf courses. The tours are easily booked and all you need to do it turn up to the shop on time to jump on the mini bus and you are off to play golf for the day.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Dissapointing
Review:
Most of the courses are a good drive away and that will cost you most of the day, sometimes coming back when it’s dark.

Way too high a price added for the transportation

Often arrive at a golf course unexpected and or delayed t-times

Top golf courses in the proximity of Pattaya were not to be found on the playing list in the time I was there. Maybe, that changes following customer feedback.

Location of office, on worst street, (one of the real bad roads in Pattaya).

Never given discount when showing Pattaya Sports Club membership, although officially stated that there would be a discount when presenting the card.

Expect to pay for your partner also, hence I found an alternative.

This review is based upon my own experiences, with the remarks others mentioned to me that verified that I was not alone in my opinion.

You of course will have your own experiences, just be aware that what appears to be cheap is not always as it appears to be.
Especially for group bookings.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Best spot for Golfers! Super Golf-Touren!
Review:
Gott sei Dank habe ich Thai-Ger Line Golf gefunden!
So macht Golfspielen als Single-Golfer in der Umgebung von Pattaya Spaß!
Man spart sich die ganze Anmelderei und das Problem des wie-hinkommens und dann ist das ganze noch preisgünstiger.
Ich habe einmal einen Einzeltrip mit Hotelabholung gebucht, hat prima geklappt alles.
Aber viel besser sind die gemeinsamen Touren: Jeden Tag mit dem Thai-Ger Line Minibus zu einem anderen Golfplatz.
Anders könnte ich mir Golfen in Pattaya gar nicht mehr vorstellen!
Super, super, super!
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Best golf and hotel arrangements in and around Pattaya
Review:
Thai-Ger Line golf has set up our entire golf trips to Pattaya many times. Airport transfers, tee times, golf course transfers and hotel reservations are all well handled. Over the years we have had 8 trips and over 60 tee times set entirely up by Thai-Ger Line. The arrangements have always gone smoothly, always on time and exactly as we requested.
The courses around Pattaya are the best and the golf experience has always been outstanding. If you like great golf, beautiful courses, Thai-Ger Line will make it happen.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Sehr gut
Review: Sind nur Anfänger aber hatten auf dem Übungs Platz sehr viel Spaß. Dazu kommt, zuvorkommendes personell. Immer wieder gerne.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Une equipe efficace et super organisee pour les golfeurs
Review:
Vaste choix de packages golf, comprenant transport AR hotel-golf, green fee, cadye, voiturette. On joue sur des parcours internationnaux.
Nous y retournons cette annee. Faites comme nous.
Hotel_Name: ThaiGerLineGolfพทยาไทย

Title: Отлично!
Review:
Замечательная Школа! Интересное , понятное обучение. Отличные преподаватели. Рекомендую 👍
Прошла несколько курсов, обязательно вернусь продолжить обучение.
Hotel_Name: ThaiProfiMassageSchoolพทยาไทย

Title: замечательная школа
Review:
отличная школа и преподаватели, очень понравилось!
они преподают много разных курсов массажана на русском языке.
Hotel_Name: ThaiProfiMassageSchoolพทยาไทย

Title: Highly experienced instructors
Review:
Started the AFF course
A professional environment with experienced instructors that take their job very seriously.
The training course was sufficient with theoretical and practical materials. Instructors were always open for questions and discussions and the whole course is tailored to your learning and absorbance capabilities.
I will definitely return to continue my AFF course.
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: Lifetime Experience
Review: I was planning to do skydiving for a longtime and I did it. Trust me, it was an amazing feeling I would say everyone should try it at least once in a life time.You can easily book it online. you just need to search in google " Thai skydiving". A link will pop up and so on.They have two timing first one starts on 7:00 am and second one starts on 11:00 am. These are pick up time from your hotel. The overall cost 11500 THB the skydiving fees and 5800 THB is for the photos and exclusive videos. If don't want to exclusive videos than 4800 THB. Basically , for exclusive videos they shoot a video with a go pro after opening the parachute and view is simple amazing. So, if you are in pattaya , you give it a try.I can guarantee you that you are not going to regret.
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: AFF course
Review: I have been to this dropzone in attempt to do AFF course it was wonderful experience that I thought i never gonna have it. Very cool people and friendly and great instructor will keep learning more about Skydiving. And I am sure i love skydiving.
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: Best time ever
Review: I had such an amazing, exciting time. I did a tandem when travelling around Thailand. I felt really safe and taken care of. The staff were all super friendly and my instructor made me feel like I was in good hands. Thaisky will go the extra mile for you and when I asked about food and accommodation it was all taken care of. They even picked me up from my hotel. I made a few new friends while there and now we are booking in to do our AFF. Highly recommended
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: Le top
Review: A faire pour de bonne sensation une équipe très professionnelle ils connaissent bien leur travail vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermes
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: Solo fun jumpers: get your licence before visiting
Review: I have been to this dropzone in attempt to do a solo fun jump. Although I'm a student skydiver with 52 jumps with the last jumps being 2 weeks prior to visiting, I was required to carry out a refresher course/jump costing €185 before I do a solo jump. Unlike other countries, this was a requirement in this area. I paid €90 taxi to get to the dropzone from Bangkok, which made all this not worthwhile on my 3 week holiday. Be careful and check things beforehand.
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: Amazing experience!
Review:
It was so exiting and breathtaking!
The staff were super friendly, they explained everything to me and made the whole experience incredibly fun and safe in the same time!
The pictures and videos they took of me in the air were awesome, I posted them all over facebook and instagram (I got so many likes!).
I would definitely do it again!
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: Amazing experience but worst treatment by t office staff
Review: Amazing experience t divers were too good but office staff is worst ,rude ,non friendly especially t 2 lady staff at t desk. The lady staff didn't helped us at all n were busy wth their own mobiles n were yelling like anything on us .The managing staff should seriously see into this as most of t ppl has reviewed t same as I m doing . Even Sunny one of t person working their was not at all helpful n was rude which turned our awesome experience into a little disappointment
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: Pricing make sure you get the updated rates
Review:
My Hotel staff booked me for 9500
I get there and find the prices have gone up to 10500 since Jan 16.
Hotel staff on phone where did not get a price confirmation.
The management of Thaisky.
Said it is the outside hotels to know their new prices.
While admitting hotel staff should confirm prices.
Thaisky does not take responsibility to also make sure outside persons representing them know the proper information given to then by Thaisky.
All this was said to me by the owner who hung up on me .sad way to deal in business.
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: New life. Great team
Review:
Incredible & no explanations for joyful and fear
You feel like you got die then born when you retch earthquake
I love it and I want do it again
Just Do It
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: Highly experienced instructors
Review:
Started the AFF course
A professional environment with experienced instructors that take their job very seriously.
The training course was sufficient with theoretical and practical materials. Instructors were always open for questions and discussions and the whole course is tailored to your learning and absorbance capabilities.
I will definitely return to continue my AFF course.

I love it and I want do it again
Just Do It
Hotel_Name: Thaiskyadventuresพทยาไทย

Title: สวนผีเสื้อ
Review: มีผีเสื้อเยอะมากสวยงามมากครับ น่าไปชมครับ แนะนำ ใครไปเที่ยวที่พัทยาก็สมควรไปครับ ค่าเข้าชมก็ไม่แพงเท่าไหร่ครับ
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: ผีเสื้อเยอะมาก สวยที่สุดในประเทศไทย
Review: ที่สวนมีผีเสื้อเยอะมาก พนักงานดูแลเอาใจใส่ดี เป็นกันเอง กาแฟอร่อย มีมุมให้นั่งพักผ่อน อากาศเย็นสบาย ที่จอดรถกว้างมาก ผีเสื้อดูสุขภาพดี ตัวใหญ่ สวยมาก สามารถถ่ายภาพได้อย่างชัดเจน ใครมาที่พัทยาแนะนำให้มาที่นี่เลยค่ะ เหมาะสำหรับพาเด้กๆมาด้วยก็ได้ มีกิจกรรมให้ทำเยอะเลย
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: สวย สะอาดตา น่าเที่ยว
Review: สวนผีเสื้อเปิดใหม่ สวย สะอาดตา ผีเสื้อหลากหลายชนิด เป็นแหล่งท่องเที่ยวที่น่าไปชมสักครั้งในชีวิต เหมาะสำหรับกิจกรรมนอกบ้านสำหรับครอบครัว และเป็นแหล่งเรียนรู้ที่ดีสำหรับ เด็กและผู้ใหญ่ทุกเพศ ทุกวัย มุมกาแฟ เหมาะแก่การพักผ่อนหย่อนใจ สวนสวยร่มรื่น
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: ไม่เลว
Review: แพงไปหน่อย 250 บาทเมื่อเทียบกับฟาร์มสัตว์ข้าง ๆ ราคา 80 บาท . ค่อนข้างดีสำหรับ 15 นาทีในการเดินผ่าน แต่ไม่คุ้มกับราคา
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: สวนผีเสื้อที่ใหญ่ที่สุดในโลก !!
Review: ฉันไปสวนผีเสื้อกับสามีของฉันและฉันรักมันมาก พวกเขามีพื้นที่ฟอเรสต์ฝนและร้านกาแฟที่น่ารักคุณสามารถนั่งลงและผีเสื้อจะมาและลงจอดกับคุณ มีข้อมูลที่น่าสนใจมากมายเกี่ยวกับความสำคัญของผีเสื้อในระบบนิเวศและทางเดินที่สวยงามถัดจากลำธารและน้ำพุ ทุกคนควรเข้าชมอย่างน้อยหนึ่งครั้งเพราะมันทำให้คุณใกล้ชิดกับธรรมชาติและทำให้คุณรู้สึกน่ารักตลอดทั้งสัปดาห์! การบำบัดสุดวิเศษสำหรับผู้ที่รักโลกใบนี้ที่ทำให้เราสามารถอยู่ที่นี่ได้!
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: สวนผีเสื้อแสนผ่อนคลายใกล้พัทยา
Review:
เรามาที่นี่เพื่อใช้เวลายามบ่ายอันเงียบสงบและสำรวจสิ่งใหม่
เจ้าของเป็นกันเองมากและผีเสื้อที่แตกต่างกันมากมายจากทั่วประเทศไทย

สถานที่ที่ดีที่จะไปลองกาแฟของพวกเขาบนแพลตฟอร์มดู ทุกอย่างใหม่และสะอาด!
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: สถานที่ที่สวยงามที่จะทำใจให้สบายและสงสัย
Review: แนะนำเป็นอย่างยิ่งกับเด็ก ๆ เรามีประสบการณ์ที่ไม่เหมือนใครในการเพลิดเพลินไปกับสิ่งมีชีวิตที่น่าอัศจรรย์เหล่านั้นกับเด็ก ๆ สถานที่ที่ดีเยี่ยมในการทำใจให้สบายในสภาพแวดล้อมที่สงบสุข
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: สิ่งที่ต้องทำเมื่ออยู่ในประเทศไทย
Review: สวนผีเสื้อที่น่าทึ่ง! ทุกคนที่รักผีเสื้อหรือธรรมชาติควรเยี่ยมชม เพลิดเพลินกับกาแฟในขณะที่คุณทำใจให้สบายด้วยวิวที่สวยงามคุณจะไม่เสียใจ
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: คุ้มค่าแก่การเยี่ยมชม!
Review: ขอให้มีความสุขในตอนเช้าที่สวนกับเด็กสองคนของเรา มุมผีเสื้อไม่เพียงให้ข้อมูล แต่ยังให้ความเพลิดเพลินในการเยี่ยมชมเช่นกัน เด็ก ๆ สนุกสนานไปกับการวนเวียนอยู่ในสวนและเรียนรู้มากมายเกี่ยวกับสิ่งมีชีวิตที่สวยงามในเวลาเดียวกัน ผีเสื้อสวยเพียงพวกมันสงบและไม่บินไปเมื่อคุณเข้าใกล้ แต่อย่าแตะต้อง! โดยวิธีการที่สวนสาธารณะที่ดีสำหรับการถ่ายภาพเกินไป
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: ฟาร์มผีเสื้อ ฯพณฯ
Review: ความเชี่ยวชาญระดับสูงสำหรับสัตว์และการตกแต่งด้วยความรักและรสนิยมเป็นลักษณะเฉพาะของอุทยานแห่งนี้ ฉันชอบมุมมองจากร้านกาแฟ
Hotel_Name: TheButterflyCornerพทยาไทย

Title: Best bar in town
Review:
Awesome party place with top girls serving and good blokes to chat with, all topped off with great cold drinks aplenty from the bar.
Great for a laugh and fun with all the drinking games, also the girls are very beautiful that serve you (Boom) she is definitely "Boom for you Buck", what a smoking hot chick!
I will be going back soon as I can, missing the place already.
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Awesome Bar to PARTY!!!
Review:
Great place with great drinks, great music, great staff and great atmosphere. It's the best place to start your night out with drinking games and to have a laugh with the manager and owners who frequent the bar as well.
Was in there one night and another fellow patron rang the bell (shouts everyone in the bar a drink) about 43 times...how did I get back to my room hahaha.
The girls who work there are super friendly and the layout is nice and roomy, I love the fact if you spend enough in one bill you get your portrait painted onto the bars infamous wall.
I highly recommend everyone who visits Pattaya to visit The Escobar!
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Great bar
Review: By far the best bar on soi bakhow.. Cheap drinks, friendly staff.. Good location.. brilliant wall picture!!
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Европейский бар
Review: Бар для европейцев. Народу очень много. Веселый персонал. Для разнообразия можно посетить. Напитки как везде, цены так же.
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Superb fun
Review: Great bar to go to and meet new ppl if it's your first time in pattaya always fun and lots of drinking games with great management and bar staff and is good for making friends for life
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Best bar in pattaya!!
Review: Visit this bar nearly every day while in pattaya, great place to meet new people and have a good time! Really fun place with amazing owners.. 100% recommend this bar to anyone visiting pattaya weather your in a group or traveling alone get yourself there 👍
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Best bar in town
Review:
Awesome party place with top girls serving and good blokes to chat with, all topped off with great cold drinks aplenty from the bar.
Great for a laugh and fun with all the drinking games, also the girls are very beautiful that serve you (Boom) she is definitely "Boom for you Buck", what a smoking hot chick!
I will be going back soon as I can, missing the place already.
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Awesome Bar to PARTY!!!
Review:
Great place with great drinks, great music, great staff and great atmosphere. It's the best place to start your night out with drinking games and to have a laugh with the manager and owners who frequent the bar as well.
Was in there one night and another fellow patron rang the bell (shouts everyone in the bar a drink) about 43 times...how did I get back to my room hahaha.
The girls who work there are super friendly and the layout is nice and roomy, I love the fact if you spend enough in one bill you get your portrait painted onto the bars infamous wall.
I highly recommend everyone who visits Pattaya to visit The Escobar!
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Great bar
Review: By far the best bar on soi bakhow.. Cheap drinks, friendly staff.. Good location.. brilliant wall picture!!
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Европейский бар
Review: Бар для европейцев. Народу очень много. Веселый персонал. Для разнообразия можно посетить. Напитки как везде, цены так же.
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Superb fun
Review: Great bar to go to and meet new ppl if it's your first time in pattaya always fun and lots of drinking games with great management and bar staff and is good for making friends for life
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: Best bar in pattaya!!
Review: Visit this bar nearly every day while in pattaya, great place to meet new people and have a good time! Really fun place with amazing owners.. 100% recommend this bar to anyone visiting pattaya weather your in a group or traveling alone get yourself there 👍
Hotel_Name: TheEscobarPattayaพทยาไทย

Title: The Manchester Bar Pattaya
Review:
fantastic bar on Action Street Pattaya.
Manageress Neya was lovely and friendly and her staff did everything they could to make us feel comfortable and make our night extremely enjoyable.
Great bar, lovely ladies.
Hotel_Name: TheManchesterBarพทยาไทย

Title: Best Bar in Thailand
Review:
I have been to hundreds of bars all over the World, By Far Manchester Beer Bar on Action Street, Soi Buakhao Pattaya is the BEST.

Beautiful all female staff are amongst the friendliest girls in Pattaya.

Prices are good and service is outstanding.

– Free WIFI
– Pool Table
– Live Football

If you do not go there you missed the BEST
Hotel_Name: TheManchesterBarพทยาไทย

Title: New Gentleman's Club Pattaya, The Mews
Review:
Great venue discrete, friendly hostesses with food available in very luxury setting.
Off Pratumnak Hill between soi 5&6. Can visit alone and be made welcome or with friends for a fun day out open from 2pm until late.
A memorable visit!
Hotel_Name: TheMewsพทยาไทย

Title: ทำอาหารไทร
Review: ฉันได้มาประเทศไทยและได้ทำอาหาร กับ the recipe thai cooking มันเป็นอะไรที่มันสุดยอดมากเท่าที่ฉันเคยเจอ
Hotel_Name: TheRecipeThaicookingพทยาไทย

Title: Thai cooking
Review: อาหารมหัศจรรย์คนน่าอัศจรรย์เวลาที่น่าอัศจรรย์ ฉันทำแผ่นที่ดีที่สุดเท่าที่ฉันเคยมีในประเทศไทยมาแล้ว! ทุกคนเป็นซุปเปอร์ที่เป็นประโยชน์และน่าทึ่ง! อาหารที่ฉันทำก็อร่อยทุกอย่า
Hotel_Name: TheRecipeThaicookingพทยาไทย

Title: Good Massage place
Review: We checked this place out as a potential spa day, and the cost for a foot massage was 300 bhat, which is a bit higher than average, but you get the spa experience from it, air conditioned area, quiet, relaxing. We tried to book a time to do an actual spa package but they never responded to my inquiries and when we showed up in person they were booked up. So I can only go off of their foot massage as my review of the place and the menu they provided. The spa packages seemed reasonably priced for the area, wish we had the chance to explore more of their service and techniques, but all in all, pretty good foot massage.
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Bad service. Angry manager!
Review:
Bad place. Has very few massues. One or two might be good. But the one who gave me a therapy was particularly raw and untrained!

The manager was rude and intolerant. Avoid!
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Erholung
Review:
Sehr saubere Spa mit netten Mitarbeiterinnen.
Habe 1std Aloe Vera massage gebucht, da ich starken Sonnenbrand habe.
Die Massage war hervorragend!
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: The best massage in town!
Review: Ook tijdens onze afgelopen vakantie (net als al een aantal maal hiervoor) ben ik hier bijna dagelijks geweest. Dit is een heerlijke ervaring geweest. Verschillende behandelingen en masseuses gehad, allemaal zeer goed. Ik heb een favoriet, maar dat zal per persoon verschillen. De zaak is groot, schoon, rustig en mooi ingericht. Ik kom hier graag.
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Hit the spot
Review:
A very good first massage on our return to Thailand. I had an oil massage that was strong but not too aggressive and my partner had a foot massage which was finished off with a head and shoulder massage. Both girls were very nice and professional and we finished off our visit with a cup of ginger tea(and handing over their well earned bahts)
A very clean parlour which I would be happy to visit again.
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Great massage
Review: Great variety of treatments and really good knowledgeable staff. Nice ambience. Been here for several years and keeps getting back when I am in the area. Starts to get a little worn-down but still a great place.
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: 전반적으로 좋았어요~
Review:
오랜 역사를 가지고 있는 만큼
시설이 막 좋진 않아요~
끝나고 요렇게 망고랑 차를 주는데 둘다 넘 맛있었어툐!
마사지 시원하고 좋았습니다.
방마다 에어컨 따로 있는 거 같던데
빵빵하게 틀어주셔서 오히려 조금 춥게 느껴졌던거 같아요.
허브볼 마사지 받았는데,
새걸로 뜯어서 해줘서 더욱더 신뢰가 갔습니다!
Good!!
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Worn out and bad service
Review: I was so disappointed with the condition and cleanliness of the place. The washroom floor was wet and lack cleaning service. This is so usual in Thailand’s SPA. A lot of the facilities such as toilet paper holder and tap are broken. Even the slippers, towels and chairs are broken and worn out. I am further disappointed by the poor service of the therapist. I strongly believe they need a big refurbishment and upgrade of service in order to continue with business.
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: How to find male massage therapist for my wife? Our planning for Pattya in first week of April.?
Review: We are Indian couple we are planning to come pattya in April 1st week.. My wife try male massage therapist so please help us for good male masseur.
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: The differentiator between a cheap but mediocre massage and a slightly expensive but totally worth it massage!
Review:
Most other places in Thailand charge 200 TBH for a foot massage. The Relax charges 350 TBH. I was skeptical to pay 150 TBH extra, but at the end of the massage, I realized why it's totally worth it to pay more here.

- The place gives you a complete vibe of elegance, professionalism and calmness as soon as you enter, unlike the cheaper roadside massages parlours all over Pattaya
- The welcome at the reception, a specially created provision for the staff to wash your feet properly before you begin your massage
- Comfortable changing clothes and rooms in which you feel safe and comfortable to change
- Great, relaxing aroma and soothing music
- Extremely comfortable chairs

Now, the main part:
You know you are in safe hands (literally) the moment she touches your feet and starts massaging the pressure points. I think I fell asleep within five minutes of start of the massage. It just cannot get any more heavenly and rejuvenating than this!!

After an extremely satisfying and relaxing foot massage, they even give you a thorough head and back massage without using any oils or lotion. We wished they would go on and on!

A major plus point was that the masseuses weren't talking amongst themselves at all. It was just the peaceful silence, along with extremely soothing music and a pair of strong hands bringing your tired feet back to life..

I tried others and hence can conclude that The Relax is the best massage place because:

We tried a foot massage at Bangkok from a local 200 TBH place and I couldn't wait for it to get over! After a long shopping day, my tired feet craved some good massaging. But she was putting too much pressure on all the wrong points. I had to ask her to be gentle and show here where exactly I needed the pressure! They gave a head and back massage too, but it was more of stretching and pulling rather than a feel good massage. And the masseuses were chattering away to glory which was irritating and distracting.

So either spend 200 TBH on a massage that does nothing for you or spend just 150 TBH more on a massage that will leave wanting for more!!
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Good Massage place
Review: We checked this place out as a potential spa day, and the cost for a foot massage was 300 bhat, which is a bit higher than average, but you get the spa experience from it, air conditioned area, quiet, relaxing. We tried to book a time to do an actual spa package but they never responded to my inquiries and when we showed up in person they were booked up. So I can only go off of their foot massage as my review of the place and the menu they provided. The spa packages seemed reasonably priced for the area, wish we had the chance to explore more of their service and techniques, but all in all, pretty good foot massage.
Hotel_Name: TheRelaxSpaandMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Breathing Space along Soi 7
Review:
This bar is on a small soi midway down soi 7
It offers a calm watering hole away the loud music and cheering hostesses of soi 7 & 8
The food offered is good quality English Fayre also a 'Falang style' Thai menu
We sampled the Egg & Bacon sarnie which was the best we had in Pattaya
Beer & Spirit prices are relatively cheap, measures are generous.
Steve is the owner, formally from Whitley Bay in Durham UK
Recommended if you want a pit-stop away from the action
Hotel_Name: TheRisingSunBarFoodพทยาไทย

Title: Amazing sauna and pool
Review:
Was quite impressed by this hidden local gem. The complex has a fitness gym (which i cannot comment on since we didn't come for that) and a sauna common area with an outdoor pool and a restaurant. The place looks well maintained and is mostly for locals. cost is only 190 THB per person and small kids are free. You are given a towel and a change of clothes (shirt and shorts) which you can wear to sauna and pool, though you could just swim in your own costume.

Once inside, the sauna complex has 1 steam room, 2 saunas with different temperatures, 2 small very cold pools and 2 warm/hot pools (1 each for men and women), 1 large common open air pool and a salt room, where you can relax by burying yourself inside the salt (you have to be dry though if you want to go in, and pay additional 20THB).

This is set around the open air but covered restaurant which sells all kinds of drinks and thai food. They have quite a big variety of drinks and food, which are moderately priced, taste is good.

Overall, a lovely place to relax if you like the sauna and pool experience, not too crowded.

Its a little bit out of the way, about 15km from Bangsaen center, and 40km from Pattaya. I don't know if there is any way to get there besides by your own car, because it is hidden in the mainland, out of the way of the centers, near residential areas.
I have been twice already and look forward to go again.
Hotel_Name: Thesensesaunaandfitnessศรราชาไทย

Title: Orribile!!!!!!!!!!!!
Review: Locale da evitare assolutamente… La musica è orribile tenuta ad un volume mostruoso anche tenendo le dita nelle orecchie mi ha perforato i timpani! La ciliegina sulla torta dentro si può fumare quindi una puzza da schifo ma… Attenzione attenzione non si può svapare! Per quanto mi riguarda possono chiedere domani mattina
Hotel_Name: TheStonesHouseพทยาไทย

Title: 非常差的酒吧
Review: 一上来就要求点酒，台上表没到能带动气氛的点上，我说看看气氛再说，刚从别的酒吧过来，店员也不交流，就要我点酒，酒吧这么卖酒算是跪着卖了，果断走人。在泰国见到最差的酒吧，没有之一。
Hotel_Name: TheStonesHouseพทยาไทย

Title: Неплохо, живая музыка
Review: Фактически один из первых клубов при входе на Вокинг стрит. На входе охрана проверяет на запрещенку, бутылку воды в рюкзаке не дала пронести с собой (на выходе отдали обратно). На сцене группа исполняет камеры на мировые шлягеры современную попсу формата Европы плюс. В счастливый час пиво (маленькое) по 95 батт, вроде с 8 до 10. Официанты назойливые, ты ещё не допил, подходят -"повторить?", и так не один раз. Музыка приятная, знакомая с радио, мы рано были, а попозже вполне потанцевать можно было бы.
Hotel_Name: TheStonesHouseพทยาไทย

Title: One of our favorites
Review: We soon adopted this bar as our local in Pattaya. Has a great feel to it. Efficient and friendly staff who love to come and have a chat with you. Highly recommend you visit here.
Hotel_Name: TheThirstyCamelพทยาไทย

Title: หาดทรายสีขาว
Review: หาดทรายสวย ทะเลน้ำใส ของขายหลากหลาย อาหารค่อนข้างดี และ ราคาจับต้องได้ เรามากันสามคน แบบ วันเดย์ทริป เหมาะกับการมาพักผ่อน และถ่ายรูปเป็นที่ระลึก
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: อนุชาติ สิงหชาติ
Review: หาดนี้ดีมีที่ดำน้ำดูประการัง แต่ต้องนั่งเรือไปจะดี ขับรถไปไม่ดี เพราะทางแคบ เขามันชันมาก ทางก้อเต็มไปด้วยป่า อย่างกะเข้าป่า น่ากลัวมาก
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: หาดทองหลาง
Review:
หาดไม่ยาวมาก ทรายละเอียด น้ำใสดี แต่ไม่เท่าหาดตาแหวน
ได้เดินชืวๆอยู่แปปนึง คนไม่ค่อยเยอะ
ถนนหนทางค่อนข้างน่ากลัว เพราะทางชัน ต้องขับรถระมัดระวัง
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: หาดทองหลาง
Review: เป็นอีกหาดที่อยู่ในเกาะล้าน เป็นหาดที่สงบคนไม่เยอะ เดิน เล่นน้ำ ชิวๆบนหาด เหมือนเป็นหาดส่วนตัวเพราะคนไม่ค่อยเยอะ
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: หาดทรายขาว ทรายนุ่ม น้ำทะเลใส นักท่องเที่ยวไม่เยอะ
Review: ชอบหาดนี้เพราะคนไม่เยอะมาก เดินเล่นชิลๆ น้ำใสสู้หาดตาแหวนไม่ได้แต่ก้อโอเคอยู่ ทรายสะอาด เดินนุ่มเท้ามาก หาดนี้ไม่ค่อยมีร้านค้านะ
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: เที่ยวเกาะไม่ไกลจากกรุงเทพ
Review: เที่ยวเกาะไม่ไกลจากกรุงเทพ ที่พักราคาพอรับใด้และสมเหตุสมผล บรรยากาศตอนกลางคืนนั้นเงียบสงบไม่วุ่นวาย เหมาะแก่การพักผ่อน มีหลายหาดให้เลือกเที่ยวใด้ตามสบาย
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: amazing
Review: amazing หาดสวยๆ ควรไปให้ครบทุกๆหากที่อยู่บนเกาะล้านเดินทางสะดวกหมดแล้วรถลาพร้อมและควรระมัดระวังการขับขี่ด้วย
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: อีกหาดขาว
Review: เป็นอีกหนึ่งหสดที่ขาวมากๆ ผมว่าหาดนี้เงียบๆ คนไม่มากถ้าไม่มีทัวร์จีนแต่ส่วนมากก็ไม่ค่อยได้มาหาดนี้กันเท่าไหร่
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: Thong Lang Beach
Review: หาดทองหลาง เป็นอีกหาดของเกาะล้านที่มีทรายน้ำน้ำทะเลใส ที่นี่สามารถดำน้ำได้ด้วย มีร้านอาหารและร่มชายหาดให้บริการ
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: ทะเลสวย
Review: หาดที่สงบผู้คนไม่เยอะมาก มีความเป็นส่วนตัว น้ำใสมาก ไม่สกปรก บางช่วงอาจมีทัวส์จีน อย่าจะวุ่นวายได้ ไม่มีขยะเกลื่อนกลาด
Hotel_Name: ThongLangBeachเกาะลานไทย

Title: enjoyable and quick
Review: Great service and good communication, delivering quality suits as tailored to the customers needs. Really enjoyable process and fast.
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: Suits made and delivered
Review: I have had some suits made from this shop on my last 4 visits to Thailand, unfortunately due to the corona virus this has been postponed. I messaged the shop and asked if they could make me some suits. I sent them pictures of od designs I required. They have kept me measurements, made my suits and delivered them to the UK within 12 days. Will definitely be ordering se more. Thank you
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: Review for Suits
Review:
I went to Tito's wile I was visiting Pattaya, Thailand.

Me and my boys bought about 7 suits from Tito's.

Everybody was happy with their suits.

The staff at Tito's was a courteous and professional.

My suits were well-constructed and stylish.

I advise anyone visiting Pattaya, Thailand go get you a suit.
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: Amazing
Review:
I thought there would only be a few tailors in Thailand but they are on every street. Tittos was recommended to me by a good friend. The team there are so friendly, I went in they offered me a drink (which one them went to the shop to buy) and they weren't pushy.
The choice of fabrics was brilliant, they offered advice on what they had and told me about the quality.
I'm very fussy with my clothing, I import stuff from Itailor but the clothing here is on another level. I asked for loads of additional details (button hole colour, sleeve buttons, wider collar) and they did them all.
The suits look incredible. I cant recommend the team enough. If you get a chance go in and see them you wont be disappointed. I'll be ordering more from them
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: Fantastic Service and Workmanship
Review:
I always have my clothes tailored. This was my 1st visit to Tito Fashions, I must admit i was so impressed with the quality of Service and workmanship.
I would recommend Tito Fashions to all.
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent place
Review: I recommend this place to anyone who wants something special. They are very friendly and listen to you.
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: A must visit
Review: I was recently in Pattaya and happened to call into Tito Fashion. This is an amazing place if you are looking for a tailor made suit. This is the place to go. When I called in there was no pressure none so ever put on me to buy. I got 5 suits made, 12 shirts and 3 pairs of jeans, they were all delivered to my hotel. The way they were all folded and packaged was amazing. Even when l returned to Ireland, there wasn't any crease on the garments. The photos below are of some of the suits l got made by Tito Fashion
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: I have been a customer for 5 years
Review: My name is Ernie, I am an American living in China since 2010. I have been visiting Pattaya for 8 years, andTito has been my tailor for the past 5 years. They me 4 winter coats, suits (both double and single breasted), trousers (worsted, linen, with pleats and cuffs), vests, shirts (both tapered and baggy). The service has always been excellent. From my experience Tito Fashion is the best tailor in Pattaya. Veejay and Mr. Islam are good people, and want to make their customers happy. I will return in April , 2019.
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: Great service!
Review: These guys did a great job on two suits and three shirts. Efficient, reasonable price, good quality and very stylish! Would recommend.
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent, professional service
Review:
Over three years, I have purchased two suits and about ten shirts from Tito fashion and have consistently been pleased with the outcome. A high quality wool suit will cost under 200USD and has been made in a span of just three days! The guys at Tito also occasionally offer complimentary ties and handkerchiefs made from leftover material used to make your shirts. Alterations throughout the process have never incurred additional fees and the focus on your comfort in the clothes is genuine. A suit of identical quality will usually cost three of four times the price in the West...

Strongly recommend Tito Fashion to business suit folks, as well as guys looking for something eccentric to wear to a party!
Hotel_Name: TitoFashionพทยาไทย

Title: Tonys Fitness Gym
Review:
This huge gym on Pattaya 3rd Road has finally closed for good.
The huge swimming pool, badminton court, and yoga room are gone.
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: Broken and Filthy
Review: Everything is broken and filthy. Plenty of better gyms around. Avoid this one. The staff are rude towards foreigners and it feels like they are always trying shortcuts to save money thus making the gym worse and worse
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: worst gym in pattaya
Review: ive bee coming to tonys gym sports world in south pattaya for many years but looks like this is the last time the equipment is old, alot not working properly or some just broken they turn the limited aircons of after 8 pm so if you train after that time prepare to be training in a sauna and don't bother asking them to turn them back on as they wont and only one industrial fan in the entire gym also the smaller ones around the building do nothing to cool you down, its the most expensive gym in pattaya at around 5000 baht a month it is a joke like his lido grand hotel it s run down better gyms else where in pattaya.
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: Jomtiem Gym Does Not Offer Daily Visits
Review: Tony's Pattaya Gym allows daily pay visits, however went to Tony's Jomtiem Gym and they will not allow daily pay visits for tourist. There is a sign on the desk which indicates daily pay rates, but the front desk lady would not allow. Very poor business operations. Employee not informed. November 19, 2018
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: Not worth it
Review: A smaller gym could have more to offer. A lot of the equipment is not in reasonable working order. The staff are rude and decidedly cold when answering simple questions, ie: leaving the gym for anything, even lunch, nullifies your day pass. Better options are out there.
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: Not so good
Review: No AC @ 120b per visit. Convenient location, but facility needs better maintenance. Machines are in disrepair that could result in injury. Popular and vital machines can also be out of service and left unrepaired for long periods of time.
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: Could be superb!
Review: This unltra modern gym could be superb with some minor improvements to the organisation and management. They have spent a fortune on equipment, but their staff do not know what they have available. Membership at Bahts 1600 a month is competitive, but why do they charge an extra Bahts 100 for the membership card. There are loads of lockers, but members must bring their own padlock. There are showers, but no liquid soap or towels for hire. There are no paper towel dispensers and spray bottles of disinfectant in the gym. There is a wasted area ast the bottom of the escalators that could be a coffee and juice bar making money!
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: Adequate
Review:
120 baht per visit.
You have to buy their water 15 baht a large bottle.
A lot of weights machines.
Treadmills and bikes but no rowing machines.
Only one flat bench press station.
Lots of dumbbells.
There is also a punch bag and gloves and a sauna.
Does get hot as only a few fans and open windows.
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: Goodbye forever
Review: Der Service ist übel in den Keller gegangen. Unverschämt teuer, dreckig, stets kaputte Geräte, das Equipment ist alles andere als neu, schlechte Belüftung. Dazu ein Manager namens Luke, der in Insider-Kreisen hinter vorhaltener Hand als nicht besonders fähig gilt. Neuerdings ist es offiziell verboten, eigene Getränke mitzubringen. Indiskutabler geht`s nimmer! Der Laden sieht mich nie mehr wieder.
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: Disappointing Tennis Visit to Tony s Gym
Review:
We arrived at about 7.35am and enquired about the cost of playing tennis for a couple of hours. We got strange looks from the staff and they then had difficulty to give us a price and were told to sit down and wait 20 min s for another staff member who could help us. We made it clear to the lady we wanted to play from 8am till 10am and paid our 660 baht for that period. Then at 8am we were told wait 5 minutes for the cleaning then on entering we found the court had some puddles. A lady then came with a sqeeze and I offered to do the sqeeze which I did and then some other staff came out and said you cannot play till 9am so I said if that s the case I want my money back however they then kind of conceeded and let us use the court. The court is a blue color paint which is not a nice surface to play on as its shiny and very smooth so the ball tends to skid and you don't get a true bounce.
All in all a very disappointing experience and we will not return
Hotel_Name: TonysFitnessGymพทยาไทย

Title: 가죽 제품 전문 판매점
Review:
터미널 21에서 파타야 버스 터미널 방향으로 가다보면 보이는데
뱀가죽 등 모든 종류의 가죽으로 만든 지갑 가방 혁대 등의 악세사리와
기념품을 구비하고 있다고해서 가봤는데 입구부터 분위기가 딱딱하고
입구에 환전소가 있는 걸로 봐서 아무래도 단체 패키지 관광자용
쇼핑센터같아서 들어가기가 꺼려졌다
Hotel_Name: ToscanoShoppingMallพทยาไทย

Title: Развод и пыль в глаза
Review:
Не приятный осадок остался от посещения этого магазина.
Вещи не факт что фирменные. Купил ремень из крокодильей кожи, через год не активной носки он треснул и сломался в пяти местах. Внутри какая-то шляпа, не имеющая отношения к кожи рептилий.
Деньги не малые стоит в магазине. Спустя 4 дня после покупки, на острове колан носили такие же но дешевле в 10 раз.
Рекомендую при выборе задуматься о оригинальности изделий продаваемых там.
Hotel_Name: ToscanoShoppingMallพทยาไทย

Title: Deri kıyafet almak istiyorsanız. çok değişik modeller var.
Review: Bangkok pattaya transferinde rehberlerin götürdüğü bir derici. Türk çalışanları var. Size çay ikram ediyorlar. önce derilerin nasıl işlendiğini, nasıl yapıldığının sunumunu anlatıyorlar. sonra satış reyonuna geçiliyor ve çok güzel fil, timsah derilerinden yapılmış çanta kemer ve montları görüyorsunuz. hele çok hafif yapılmış bir mont var. bayıldım. ama yaklaşık 1.500 TL geldiğinden almadım. mont üstünüzde yok gibi. pazarlık da yapabiliyorsunuz. bar ve yiyecek bölümü de var. Hatta barda çok komik bir koltuk var. orada mutlaka fotoğraf çektirin. hediyelik eşya alım bölümü de var. kısacası her şey düşünülmüş.
Hotel_Name: ToscanoShoppingMallพทยาไทย

Title: Good live music bar
Review:
I'm a bit puzzled by the information here. For example, this beer bar is close to Soi 2 but the map shows it being quite far from Soi 2. The address is 78/14 Pattaya Second Road.

And regarding the hours for live music, I believe it's something like 9 PM to 3 AM. The band plays well into the night and they do a good job. My friends and I were there in March of this year and we had a good time.

It's an open bar so there is no air conditioning but they do have ceiling fans. It is easily found by using the many baht buses that run right past it on Second Road.

Their telephone number is 085-826-8034.
Hotel_Name: ToyBeerBarพทยาไทย

Title: Live Music
Review: I think the best live rock band in town. Acceptable drinks prices, friendly staff. The only minor complaint I have for the chairs at the tables, they could be more comfortable.
Hotel_Name: ToyBeerBarพทยาไทย

Title: Pattaya Food Court
Review: Situated in the busy part of Pattaya, a food court with a large variety of feasts. Anything from fish and chips to Thai food to Tacos , you can buy a cold beer sit in the main court and people watch .it can be very noisy later at night ,so pick your time .
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: И так каждый день.
Review: В первую очередь это комплекс ресторанов, которые работают в основном вечером. Вечером зажигаются много красивых огней. Постепенно стекаются люди и начинается праздник. Громко звучит музыка, наливают вино и пиво. Поглощаются центнеры морепродуктов и мяса . И так каждый день. А если без шуток - еда в основном вкусная, морепродукты свежие, люди веселые. Что еще нужно для отдыха? Находится в центре Паттайи, рядом с ночным рынком. Добраться легко из любой точки города.
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: Great place for dinner and drinks
Review: I have enjoyed a couple of great restaurants in tree town. This place is definitely set up for having a few more tourists. I think this will be an up-and-coming area in the future. I don’t understand why they are charging to use the bathrooms when they are not even clean properly!.
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: Full of glitter ,open air restaurants
Review:
Delicious rotating fish on spits and a food court choice of different types of Thai food .
Some are hit or miss ,butbthebbestvones are popularvwith local Thai people :pad Thain+noodle dishes
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: お店も多く出来賑わってきた
Review:
以前は空き地のように寂れていたが、最近は整備されお店の出店も増えかなりの賑わいを見せている。

夜がメインで夜からのお店も多い。タイ料理はもちろん、和食やファラン飯、バービヤ、カフェ、ダーツバーがあり、一番人気はシーシャの吸えるarea39のレストランバー。
その隣にあるダーツバーがお気に入りで、周りの屋台からツマミを持ち込みシーシャもオーダー出来てお酒を飲みながらダーツを楽しむ。最高です。
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: 数年前よりも
Review:
前は本当に閑散としていましたが、最近はバービアも出来たりレストランが出来たりで、結構にぎわっています。
マッサージ屋さん、ムーカタ屋、日本の居酒屋、バービアと色々満喫出来ると思いますので、ちょっと覗いてみてはどうでしょう
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: ナイトマーケット裏
Review: セカンドロードからだとナイトマーケットの丁度裏側にあります。ソイ９かソイメイドインをソイブッカオまで抜けたトコにあります。時代屋や兎といった居酒屋？や韓国料理・バービア・ビアガーデン等結構色々集まってます。通りには青空屋台もあって、ソコがなかなか安くて上手い！芝生なんかが敷いてあってオブジェなんかもあって良い雰囲気ですね。
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: 5月に行った時より
Review: 今年5月にパタヤに行った時より店も増えており、食べる所も多くなっていました。ただバービアはいつの通り活気がなく寄らなくてもいいかなという感じでした。
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: 쏘이 부아카오에 있는 술집타운
Review:
쏘이 부아카오에 있는 그리 크지 않은 술집들이
모여있는 곳으로 각가 개성있는 인테리어로 손님들을
끌고 있으며 라이브음악을 하는 곳도 있다
10시 이후 밤늦은 시간에 가야 손님들이 모여든다
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: BarBeer街に変身
Review: 去年の７月には何もなかったのですが、今年１月に行ったときには様変わりしていました。時間も早かったせいか余りこんでいませんでした。
Hotel_Name: TreeTownพทยาไทย

Title: Reggae.
Review: Dersom du liker reggae er dette stedet. Veldig bra musikk. Ser at en del klager på høy lyd og at det ikke er barnevennlig. Lurer da på hvorfor en bar skal være barnevennlig, det finnes andre steder å ta med barna. Musikken er høy, det er nok meningen det, dersom man ønsker ro eller å prate finnes det nok andre steder. Her er folk, liv, røre og dans. Barene rundt er tomme men her er alltid folk. Betjeningen er hyggelig og såpass serviceinnstilt som thaiene kan være.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Bar
Review: Nice bar to chill out in but still to have a good night, live band very good and willing to let customers have a sing too which was good, lady staff very good and attentive, and no trouble in bar tnx to manager, haha have to say I'm not the biggest reggae fan but was one of the few bars in pattaya that felt could relax and chill out in
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: trenchtower.. Aldrig mer.
Review:
Trench Town Rasta Bar - Soi Buakhao

Pattaya

Smutsiga

739852652

Jag kom till Trench tower. Flickan tigger en beer för 50:-SEK och jag ger henne en beer. Hon frågar var jag kom ifrån jag svara att var jag kom ifrån. Hon svarar tillbaka :: Du din smutsiga d----a lögnare du ser ut som s---n fast värre än så. Det sa flickan till mig med hängmage och mycket smutsig sliten. Jag har precis just nu nullat med en japan som inte var så snål som du.....? Jag vill inte ha henne. Jag ville lyssna på musik.. Sen sa hon flera gånger att jag ser för d----ig ut. Jag hade nya Jeans ny T- shirt nya skor från Central Sketchers Ny duschad vilket hon långt ifrån var.. Men vill man inte ha kunder.. Men andra sidan dessa enormt tiggare är värre de utanför ICA som puffar hela tiden på din arm och säger på Thai din snåle d---l (KINJOJ FARNG) .. Då blir man rätt trött på dessa tiggare som arbetar som slavar på denna bar. Hon sa att hon får i lon 30 baht för var beer en FARANG bjuder på så hon behöver dricka typ över tjugo beer varje dag... Inte så konstigt att hon ser ut som en uteliggare.. Nej tack aldrig det stället mer aldrig. För barn är det mycket olämpligt. Ägaren är en engelsman sa flickan. Bra musik men dålig ägare som har flickorna som slavar utan lön de för alltså 10:_SEK för var beer de kan tigga till sig, och de är mycket besvärande med sitt tiggeri.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Great bar for chilling out
Review: Always spend a few nights and early mornings in here when passing through Pattaya,music is brillant plenty of people on the microphone all night some classic tunes.If you like your Bob Marley music dont miss this place.They also have another trench towm bar around soi 13 closer to walking street.The musicians are legends in here could have been in jamaica with the voices of them.Whole place gets you dancing, staff friendly and overall a very good vibe in there.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: One of my Favourite bars in Pattaya
Review:
Good music , Cheap beer prices, Friendly Lady staff.
Love a bar that plays good live music, has a decent beer price that doesn't change halfway during the night and have lady staff who serve you well without pestering you to buy them a drink.
I feel very happy and enjoy my visit time here even if i can not remember the end of the night. Thanks Rasta Bar and Lady Staff
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Full Marks; well done guys
Review:
I have been in this bar numerous times over my 3 visits to Pattaya in the last couple of years.
Drink prices OK, Amazing cocktails, great staff.
Run by 2 young Aussie guys who are doing a great job here.
On the last 2 visits to Pattaya thier mum was over from Australia. She made a wonderful addition the the place.
I would not hesitate to recommend a visit (or 2 or 3) when you in Pattaya.
They have now opened a second bar; same style but bigger on Soi 13/1.
Was lucky to be their for the opening.... a great night.
As for the volume of the music as one reviewer said was too loud !!!! i have always found converstion easy in this place as i think they have got the volume of music spot on.
The music is mainly Reggae as you would expect, but the odd customer gets up and sings, as did my son in both the bars.

Well done guys; keep up the excellent work.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Mooie rastabar
Review:
Constante druk van de aanwezige werkende dames om zoveel mogelijk te drinken en ladydrinks te kopen.
Super band en mooi ingericht anders.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Great Reggae Bar
Review: If you like Reggae Music then this is the bar for you. It is played non stop and the musicians are fairly good. Drink prices are medium range and staff are good. I could only stay between 1 - 2 hours because the music was too loud.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Loud and Expensive
Review: It's a tiny little bar and the music is LOUD! The band is ok but plays little other than reggae which gets old after an hour or two. If you want a place to hear reggae, this might be your spot, but if you want a pint or two and chat with mates - not it. You have to scream in each others ears to have a chat. Also the drinks are on average 10 - 20 baht more than average on this street.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Coole Reggae Bar mit exzellenter Live-Musik
Review: Meine Lieblingsbar in Pattaya. Klein (40 - 50 Plätze) aber immer gute Stimmung mit Reggae-Klassikern live mitten im lebhaften Nightlife der Soi Buakhao. Gemischtes meist englischsprachiges Publikum, nette Girls und - eine Seltenheit in Pattaya - eine gute Cocktailkarte! Da kann man fast alles andere was sich dort so Cocktail nennt und meistens Zuckerwasser mit a bissl billigem Alkohol ist (leider auch in vielen guten Hotels) glatt vergessen. Joel und Race, die beiden australischen Inhaber haben da in kurzer Zeit eine echte kleine Spezialität in Pattaya hingestellt. Wer in Pat mal a bissl was anderes sehen und vor allem hören will ist dort genau richtig!
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Reggae.
Review: Dersom du liker reggae er dette stedet. Veldig bra musikk. Ser at en del klager på høy lyd og at det ikke er barnevennlig. Lurer da på hvorfor en bar skal være barnevennlig, det finnes andre steder å ta med barna. Musikken er høy, det er nok meningen det, dersom man ønsker ro eller å prate finnes det nok andre steder. Her er folk, liv, røre og dans. Barene rundt er tomme men her er alltid folk. Betjeningen er hyggelig og såpass serviceinnstilt som thaiene kan være.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Bar
Review: Nice bar to chill out in but still to have a good night, live band very good and willing to let customers have a sing too which was good, lady staff very good and attentive, and no trouble in bar tnx to manager, haha have to say I'm not the biggest reggae fan but was one of the few bars in pattaya that felt could relax and chill out in
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: trenchtower.. Aldrig mer.
Review:
Trench Town Rasta Bar - Soi Buakhao

Pattaya

Smutsiga

739852652

Jag kom till Trench tower. Flickan tigger en beer för 50:-SEK och jag ger henne en beer. Hon frågar var jag kom ifrån jag svara att var jag kom ifrån. Hon svarar tillbaka :: Du din smutsiga d----a lögnare du ser ut som s---n fast värre än så. Det sa flickan till mig med hängmage och mycket smutsig sliten. Jag har precis just nu nullat med en japan som inte var så snål som du.....? Jag vill inte ha henne. Jag ville lyssna på musik.. Sen sa hon flera gånger att jag ser för d----ig ut. Jag hade nya Jeans ny T- shirt nya skor från Central Sketchers Ny duschad vilket hon långt ifrån var.. Men vill man inte ha kunder.. Men andra sidan dessa enormt tiggare är värre de utanför ICA som puffar hela tiden på din arm och säger på Thai din snåle d---l (KINJOJ FARNG) .. Då blir man rätt trött på dessa tiggare som arbetar som slavar på denna bar. Hon sa att hon får i lon 30 baht för var beer en FARANG bjuder på så hon behöver dricka typ över tjugo beer varje dag... Inte så konstigt att hon ser ut som en uteliggare.. Nej tack aldrig det stället mer aldrig. För barn är det mycket olämpligt. Ägaren är en engelsman sa flickan. Bra musik men dålig ägare som har flickorna som slavar utan lön de för alltså 10:_SEK för var beer de kan tigga till sig, och de är mycket besvärande med sitt tiggeri.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Great bar for chilling out
Review: Always spend a few nights and early mornings in here when passing through Pattaya,music is brillant plenty of people on the microphone all night some classic tunes.If you like your Bob Marley music dont miss this place.They also have another trench towm bar around soi 13 closer to walking street.The musicians are legends in here could have been in jamaica with the voices of them.Whole place gets you dancing, staff friendly and overall a very good vibe in there.
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: One of my Favourite bars in Pattaya
Review:
Good music , Cheap beer prices, Friendly Lady staff.
Love a bar that plays good live music, has a decent beer price that doesn't change halfway during the night and have lady staff who serve you well without pestering you to buy them a drink.
I feel very happy and enjoy my visit time here even if i can not remember the end of the night. Thanks Rasta Bar and Lady Staff
Hotel_Name: TrenchTownRastaBarSoiBuakhaoพทยาไทย

Title: Best massage in Pattaya!!
Review:
Best massage in Pattaya! The staff here were so lovely and welcoming, had an amazing massage for a very good price!
The shop was very clean and felt COVID safe. Beds/chairs were well spaced out and staff seemed to be taking the right precautions.
This is a must if you are visiting Pattaya.
Will definitely be returning as soon as I am able to return to Thailand.
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: The best massage in Pattaya
Review: The foot massage and the oil massage were just amazing……. The pressure and movement were perfect. The price is very correct. Go there as son as possible.
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: After sun massage
Review:
Went this afternoon for an After Sun massage as been here 2 weeks and had some time in the sun, thought be good to get the skin treated.
Spent at least 15 minutes massaging my head which not what i expected at all as if wanted that would have asked for that , lovely clean place but very disappointed with what i received and wont be going back
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: the best massage in pattaya
Review:
tum massage is the best massage in pattaya ' i visit them sevral times , enjoy every time.
found massageist name roung , very skilled/
larg varied of treatments.

highly recommended as especially roung
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Very good Thai massage
Review: I visited Tum twice on my trip, both times I had a very good Traditional Thai massage. The staff is professional and the massage has been both relaxing and therapeutic. Prices are fair. Definitely recommended.
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Thai massage and pedicure
Review:
There are hundreds of places in Pattaya to do this. But this one is good. Not too hard to find following your mobile phone directions.
Three of us off a cruise ship with time to kill. A bit of google searching and we found this. No nonsense, competent, pleasant, very inexpensive. Well run with what seems a happy hardworking team.
Very pleased and highly recommended.
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Excellent Massage
Review: Massage in Thailand can have a bad reputation, as an excuse for something else! Tum, however, is absolutely above board. We were a group of four and all had different massages, from full body to head, back and shoulders to traditional Thai delivered by women. All were excellent and we came away feeling much restored which lasted some days. We also had pedicures: recommended! Never, have my feet felt better. The staff are happy and friendly. The manager speaks reasonable English.
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Best massage in Pattaya!!
Review:
Best massage in Pattaya! The staff here were so lovely and welcoming, had an amazing massage for a very good price!
The shop was very clean and felt COVID safe. Beds/chairs were well spaced out and staff seemed to be taking the right precautions.
This is a must if you are visiting Pattaya.
Will definitely be returning as soon as I am able to return to Thailand.
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: The best massage in Pattaya
Review: The foot massage and the oil massage were just amazing……. The pressure and movement were perfect. The price is very correct. Go there as son as possible.
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: After sun massage
Review:
Went this afternoon for an After Sun massage as been here 2 weeks and had some time in the sun, thought be good to get the skin treated.
Spent at least 15 minutes massaging my head which not what i expected at all as if wanted that would have asked for that , lovely clean place but very disappointed with what i received and wont be going back
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Review: I visited Tum twice on my trip, both times I had a very good Traditional Thai massage. The staff is professional and the massage has been both relaxing and therapeutic. Prices are fair. Definitely recommended.
Hotel_Name: TumMassageพทยาไทย

Title: Thai massage and pedicure
Review:
There are hundreds of places in Pattaya to do this. But this one is good. Not too hard to find following your mobile phone directions.
